CommentsContent: This record player is awesome.  Based on some the reviews, I was really expecting bad quality sound from speakers.  Much higher quality than I had expected, sound is quite good actually.I spent 30 mins thumbing through records today, which was very nostalgic in itself.Super easy to use too!  If you’re on the fence for $45, don’t be.  Totally worth it!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 26, 2018
CommentsContent: For the price I bought this, it works fantastic.  The multiple features including Bluetooth make an old-style feel up to date. The speaker quality was surprising much louder than expected; the knob on mind never goes past 25%.  The sound quality is not the best, but the needles (there is a replacement) are good enough quality I don't need to worry about wear and tear on my vinyls.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 7, 2021
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   It arrived on time, I assembled it in about 30 seconds, and right away it worked exactly as described. For beginners just getting started with listening to records, or people who simply want to listen to a few records without spending much, this is a great deal.There are a few reviews complaining about the audio quality, and all I can think is “what did you expect for this price?” The sound quality is pretty good—certainly good enough for me to enjoy some old used classical music records like the one I attached here. If you want the sound quality to be *great* you’ll just have to plug in your headphones or spend more more money on high-end speakers. For the price, I really don’t know how you can beat this.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 26, 2019
CommentsContent: The sound quality is horrible,  it skips as the record plays.  Not happy with this purchase at all. Do not waste your money.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 11, 2020
CommentsContent: Haven't used it much yet but so far so good! I bought old Christmas vinyls to listen to this Christmas. Sound quality seems great. I don't have much experience with record players but so far I'm happy with it!

CommentsTitle: It stopped working after a month
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 30, 2020
CommentsContent: I only had it for about for about a month before it completely shut off and never turned back on even after troubleshooting. They sent me a new one at no additional charge, but I’m very nervous that it’s going to do the same thing. It makes me wish that I had gone ahead and spent the money on a higher quality record player that might not have had those issues.

CommentsTitle: My garbage disposal is more pleasant to listen to.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 2, 2020
CommentsContent: PURE JUNK.  I connected the audio out jacks to my stereo and quite frankly it sounds like a garbage disposal. You can barely make out the music it’s that bad.  Cheaply made, and they are bastardizing the name Victrola. Thank goodness I’m a Prime member because Amazon can give me my money back as in yesterday. AVOID!!!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 22, 2021
CommentsContent: Pretty cool beginner setup. Got the matching record case as well. Wish it had an auto return arm but kids can’t have everything be too easy these days.Lmao- after the first record finished she sat on the couch looking stumped. I asked her what was up? She said she was trying to figure out how to remotely get it to skip songs.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 7, 2018
CommentsContent: Pretty nice little record player for the money, I just use it once in awhile when I get in my record playing mood, so it is fine for me, the sound isn't too bad but if you really are a fan of playing records I would suggest a higher-quality, but just for using now and then or foray first time record player for a kid or 18 it works just fine and it's really cute.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 31, 2021
CommentsContent: I was not happy to receive it in the original packaging. It could easily show what was inside. and It’s a lot bigger than I had thought. The sound quality is good pretty loud. But it will sometimes skip parts on the record I have noticed not sure why it’s happening. It had happened on a couple of my old records and then it happened on my new ones and I knew that it must be the record play so be aware of that.

CommentsTitle: Victrola name is not a reason to buy this!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 12, 2021
CommentsContent: Automatically stops before record finishes! I was playing old children’s books, which are the size of a 45, but play at 33. It stopped with a good minute to go. Once the arm reaches a certain spot near the spindle, it just stops.Also, the sound was awful. I have purchased  cheaper speakers that sound better than this.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 3, 2020
CommentsContent: He said the sound could be better, but that's expected since it's so small. He likes the adjustable speed and it reminds him of when he was younger. He very excitedly showed me the old songs he used to listen to on the records he had. If anything changes I'll update the review, but so far he's a happy camper.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 14, 2020
CommentsContent: Not the worst record player out there for someone who is just starting off, but the problems with it will quickly make you upgrade. The sound quality is very tinny, which can be really nice on things like swing music to really give a retro feel, but when you’ve just paid over $40 on an album you really want, then the sound is a problem. Worse is the skipping. Since there is no counterweight on the tone arm, this thing has a really bad tendency to skip. I had one 180 gram record play in about ten seconds because the tone arm skipped over the whole thing. If you do end up getting this, be ready with a quarter to place on the tone arm and glue or tape it in place, otherwise you’ll be resetting it over and over again.Honestly, it’s best to just save up and get something nicer.

CommentsTitle: Great gift for a tween girl
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 18, 2021
CommentsContent: I had researched a number of players and selected this one because it was portable, had few parts that could break and there were a lot of positive reviews.  Judging by the look on my granddaughter's face when she opened her present, I would say it was well received.  I was very glad I purchased this as my granddaughter and I spent quite some time setting it up and playing albums.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2020
CommentsContent: Nothing fancy but it does work well. Has that slightly tinny sound that most of the small portable players had when I was a kid. Can only play one record at a time. Only issue was that I did not see anything in the instructions about removing the cover from the needle before attempting to play a record. Unpack it, put an album on, remove the needle cover (White) release the tone arm, lift the lever to the back of the player next to the tone arm, gently move tone arm over to album, lower with lever and relax while you listen to some good ole Elvis.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 1, 2020
CommentsContent: My girlfriend and I love this. It’s very easy to use. We didn’t have this little black piece which is a spacer, I opened it it was under the spin disk things and was not Spelling correctly and made everything sound slow. At first I thought it was broken until I expected it and saw it. Pulled it out and put it in its place. Everything sounded great afterwards.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 8, 2020
CommentsContent: The quality sound of this is AWFUL.I bought 2 brand new discs to play and it keeps skipping.Is awful.The only way I can get good sound out of it is actually connecting my phone in Bluetooth to it and plying the CD in my phone.I'm so disappointed :(

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 2, 2019
CommentsContent: I bought this for my grandfather for Christmas. I made sure it worked before wrapping it in the Christmas paper. The sound quality seemed to be quite well, though I haven't any idea how old records are supposed to sound. My grandfather has a large collection of old records he can no longer play because they no longer produce the needle for his old record player. I quite love the fact that Victrola includes an extra needle in the packaging. I didn't rate the quality of the bluetooth because I hadn't tried it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 2, 2019
CommentsContent: The quality of this victorola is excellent.  My daughter is in love ❤️  And it has really great features with the blue tooth hook up and a place for headphones.  Talk about nostalgia.  We have been listening to old records and laughing and dancing since it arrived.  It has opened up communication about what it was like to grow up when I was young, in a much simpler time.  I can’t say enough how happy she has been since she opened it.  If you are looking for a great Christmas present for your kids, this is it!!!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 21, 2020
CommentsContent: It's beautiful very 50's-esque. The sound quality is okay since the volume differentiates between the bluetooth and actual vinyls. It has the perfect aesthetic for listening to anything and everything from T-Swizzle to my boys Da Zombies. Totally fab, would def get again so mine can have a buddy. I would for suresies play two records at the same time and make the devil's music come to life but don't @ me because i'm all about my homie Jesus because #catholicism. Anyways... haven't traveled with it but i'm sure it would be ever so delightful. I once saw a video where a girl had like a portfolio in which she would put all her records in and I think you need one of those if you want to travel with it you know for convenience purposes. Yeah... I think she had some pretty banging records, including the original 1950 Disney Cinderella's Soundtrack which we all know is a banger. She also has some 45s which are the little records, I haven't tried one but it has the little piece for it so I'm sure it works, fingers crossed lol #haventtried #willtry #needtogetone #thinkingaboutit #butter

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 7, 2020
CommentsContent: Have had for just <3 months. I plugged in and it started smoking glowing orange from the inside.....very concerning could have burned the entire house down!

CommentsTitle: Beautiful piece, if it works that’d be even better
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2020
CommentsContent: Beautiful player. But when I received it the original box was badly damaged. And I know it didn’t happen in shipment because that packaging was fine. But I thought it’d be okay still. But when I went to play something the turntable doesn’t spin. I tried a few things and still nothing. And then when I went to try again this AM, it won’t even turn on. Super upset and I was really excited for this and bought the matching vinyl case. Hoping I can get a matching replacement that actually plays.

CommentsTitle: These high reviews are fake - this product is bad
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 9, 2020
CommentsContent: The sound quality from this turntable is hard to describe, not loud enough and keep skipping.My records are brand new and I have collected them for so many years, but now they were hurt. Obviously, the stylus is so cheap that it hurt my vinyl.I will not buy the cheap turntables to display my record.The product is bad and I can hear some voice from the inside box. I don't use it anymore.Return it to Amazon! Never believe Victrola anymore!

CommentsTitle: Make sure the needle is at the right angle!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 20, 2020
CommentsContent: You pretty much get what you pay for with this product, so I can’t really complain about the materials they use. I think the speakers are alright. My main complaint is that there is nothing that holds it open. Oh and as a warning make sure the needle is at the right angle, otherwise just replace it with the spare, because it your records will skip like crazy if the angle isn’t right. Overall great product, I have no regrets buying this

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 29, 2018
CommentsContent: Really pleased with this. I bought this for my art studio space in our attic. It's perfect for that purpose. Keep in mind that it is a suitcase record player and the speakers are what one would expect for a suitcase record player; not a wide range but a decent sound. If you're looking for a more dynamic sound, and lots of bass, then I would suggest finding some auxiliary speakers at the Goodwill and hooking them up. The mechanics feel solid. The tone arm has some weight to it. Bluetooth mode works seamlessly.Pleased as punch with this. I would buy it again in a heartbeat.

CommentsTitle: Don’t buy. Cheaply made. Makes records wobble.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 13, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this because my old record player wasn’t working. I was excited to have a portable record player that I could take back and forth from college/ home. When I first got it I thought all of records were warped. Everything kept skipping. Some of my really old records will sound okay but any newer record skips large portions of each song. After days of trying to get the table to stop wobbling I decide to return it. Save your money and your time. Don’t buy.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 3, 2020
CommentsContent: I have a few big record players that are not very travel friendly. So, I decided to purchase this portable record player. I love it so much!! It’s very lightweight. The sound quality is excellent. It’s also a Bluetooth speaker, and connects easily.I’ve had this for awhile and it still plays excellently. Not to mention, the map design is beautiful.Perfect for anyone!

CommentsTitle: Great decor piece, sounds like a vintage record player
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 19, 2021
CommentsContent: To anyone who thinks this is going to sound like crap, you are correct. All small record players like this sounded like crap back in the day or they wouldn’t have invented digital sound. It’s still decent to listen to; but that’s not the goal. It LOOKS very nice and it has that staticky, tinny, vintage sound vibe of old vinyl records, so it hits all the marks for a VINTAGE record player.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 15, 2021
CommentsContent: Did not have a 45 adapter when unpacked.  Sound quality is substandard, very tinny, absolutely no bass. The blue tooth would not connect.This reminds me of a toy record player I had as a kid. Don't expect much and you'll be happy.  Yes it's portable, it will play records and you'll be able to hear them.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 23, 2020
CommentsContent: For the price you do get a decent product. The onboard speakers adequately produce a vinyl sound but do not have a wide range to carry full high, mid, and low db clarity. The tone arm and stylus head are lightweight and will occasionally "float" across your vinyl. This sounds like you're missing/skipping through the song. I do have a fix for this though!!! Place a penny or nickel on the stylus head. This adds the extra weight needed to keep the needle in the groove and greatly increases clarity and accuracy while playing a vinyl.

CommentsTitle: Great product...but the shipping/packaging was a problem for me
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 9, 2021
CommentsContent: I love this product. It's a great record player all in all. My only issue was with the shipping/condition upon arrival.I assume this was an isolated situation, but mine arrived with the power adapter plug sticking out of the box. First I rolled my eyes, then I opened it up and noticed it had indeed gotten bent. Luckily, however, I was able to bend the prongs back and I plugged it in and tested it all, and it works fine. The product itself is great, the sound is great, etc. I just hope this shipping/packing issue doesn't happen to anyone else. I worry that it could somehow create problems as I continue to use it more and more, but fingers crossed it doesn't.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 20, 2017
CommentsContent: I received my Victrola turntable with NO POWER CORD. I now have no way of charging it or turning it on. Seeing as it is a Christmas gift, I am completely stumped on what to do when I only have five days left to figure this out. I also have no way of contacting whoever sold this. Very cute product  but I am horribly disappointed.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 1, 2020
CommentsContent: Bought it because I wanted my kid to have a hobby that doesn’t involve a screen. He expressed that it would be cool. I guess he misconstrued as I will buy a record collection and not just a few to get him on his way.

CommentsTitle: I adore it. Only one issue.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 14, 2020
CommentsContent: I adore this record player. It’s beautiful and fun. The ONLY down side I have found is that it doesn’t have a plastic box cover (like the old ones) to protect the record from dust and dander in the air while the record is playing. If a piece of dog hair or a particularly large speck of dust lands on it while it’s playing, it skips every time. But other than that, I love it :)

CommentsTitle: Thanks so much Amazon Team members in Customer service, And shipping department
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 27, 2020
CommentsContent: To listen to LPs I have not listened to for many years. Just arrived home from work, I have not had time to open the box, I hope it plays very well tanks Amazon team members Be safe, And  Happy holidays.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 10, 2019
CommentsContent: This is not for audiophiles. BUT, it works good enough for everyone else. The sound quality is good, crisp, and what I expected. The platter is smaller than a 12", so I suggest getting a 7" slip mat for better grip on the vinyl.  The speakers are not great, so don't crank it up, it will only blow out the sound. Headphones are great or Bluetooth or audio jacks; it's a tight unit.  Perfect as a first turntable. Do make sure to use the lock down clip and the pick up/lower lever.  Makes it last longer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 3, 2020
CommentsContent: remember the little record players you had when you where a kid? well these are even worse! great great for a use once or twice and then throw in the trash. Plays records just fine, sounds awful, and the line out BUZZES like nobodies business

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 9, 2019
CommentsContent: I'm obsessed with my new player. I've been using it almost every night. It is very user friendly and easy to use so would suggest for someone new to record players. Comes with 2 extra needles which is wonderful and an instruction booklet which is helpful. Overall the sound quality is great and would definitely suggest to purchase. I haven't tried the phone connection yet but would expect the same quality. Happy customer.

CommentsTitle: It looks pretty & it sounds great
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 29, 2020
CommentsContent: I’ve wanted a record player for years and this one is amazing, light, and the sound quality is great! The records sound good & I love that you can also connect your phone!

CommentsTitle: Not the best quality, but looks great and good for beginners.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 29, 2020
CommentsContent: Much better for looks than for use. The quality its pretty poor, but at the end of the day it does work. The sound is overall pretty low and distorted when playing records, and sound it basically blown out when coming from Bluetooth. The aux out port to connect your own speakers didn't work on the one I was delivered  it wasn't worth the effort to return the device. If your just looking for an aesthetic piece it's great for the price, but I wouldn't recommend it for anyone looking for anything close to good playback quality.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 27, 2019
CommentsContent: Not even a year old and will not work. Used it 2 weeks ago and it worked. Shut it off and unplugged it. Now no power. Don't waste your money!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 15, 2021
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   Turntable was purchased as a cheap solution in restoring a 1967 Truetone Stereophic console that was on it's way to the landfill. Couldnt be happier with the sound it produces (RCA jacks). Audio is ran thru a Bluetube 50w tubed amp which in combination with the turn table produces an authentic vintage vinyl sound. The bluetooth is a nice bonus to the cabinet.

CommentsTitle: New item was obviously not new.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 1, 2020
CommentsContent: I had this sent to my daughter for her birthday. This is what she said:I waited all that time for the record player to show up and it doesnt turn on/work. Also, there is plastic wrapping (garbage) from a Jonas Brothers Record inside the plastic bag with the instruction manual in It. I cant send it back without all the info. There was no packing slip or return label or anything and I would need that stuff plus like am I supposed to pay shipping then?I am very dissatisfied since this was a gift for her!

CommentsTitle: Worked for a month now doesn’t turn on *updated
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 15, 2020
CommentsContent: I was ecstatic with this player when it came a month ago! Sound quality was great, Bluetooth worked great, it was a fantastic player for about a month and then all of a sudden it just doesn’t work. It won’t turn on at all. 3 stars pending customer service and some troubleshooting and see where we get.Update: Victrola customer service was the absolute worst customer service I have ever experienced. Ever. Thank GOD Amazon customer service is amazing and my issue was just the AC/DC cord had gone bad for some reason. Still a great player and I’m super happy with how Amazon handled everything. Sooo zero stars for Victrola and 4 for Amazon 👍🏼

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 8, 2021
CommentsContent: My husband loves to play his LP records on this player. It reminds him of when he was a kid. The sound quality is good and can’t beat the price. We had purchased another brand at first but it broke right away and we had to send it back. Glad he got a Victrola this time. Had it for about a month and doing well so far.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 9, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased this for a Christmas gift...it was given at Christmas...used a few times..it is Jan 8...and it already broke/stopped working.  The lift/lower mechanism only lowers the arm about 1/8 to 1/4" over the record...will not set the needle down on the record....will return..or try...we'll see how Amazon steps up.....Update:  Amazon did not stand by this product because I bought it in late Sept...sue me for doing my Christmas shopping early..worst customer service EVER..now trying to get replacement thru manufacturer/Victrola.  We'll see if they stand by their product!..I purchased 3 of these with matching cases for my granddaughters and gave as Christmas presents..expected them to function for more than a couple of uses!!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 5, 2021
CommentsContent: This is an extremely good turntable for beginners who are just getting into vinyl or for someone who isnt quite ready to blow the bank on a full system. This is actually my second Victrola- the first one I had for well over two years and never had a single problem. Sound quality is good and the prive is awesome.

CommentsTitle: Don't waste money on this, buy an actual record player.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 26, 2020
CommentsContent: 3rd day of listening and brand new records are skipping (we are sitting not dancing) and the speed is already starting to fluctuate. Hooking it up to a reciever is a bad idea because the cheap components sound even worse amplified.Not surprising the tiny speakers sound bad, but you can't expect much from something that size so we were hoping hooking up to our home theater would bypass that.Big Christmas disappointment.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2021
CommentsContent: Husband and I have dug out our old vinyl and are enjoying their sound again!  This player is compact and easy to store away after enjoying listening through built in speakers.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 17, 2018
CommentsContent: This Victrola Turntable is a simple, yet usable purchase for both the avid record collector and the casual vinyl listener. The turntable is easy to use, and comes with detailed and understandable directions. It is bluetooth enabled, for the times when you'd rather listen to a song thats on your phone or tablet. As the description notes, it is portable - so you can turn it off, snap the top closed, and take it wherever an outlet is (with it's handy handle). This also makes it super convenient for storing, if you don't always have space for a turntable. It would easily fit under most beds, or stashed in the closet. HOWEVER, do not worry - just because this model is simple, and storable -- it still packs the same punch of nostalgia. The sound quality is good, and the table can be turned up loud enough to rock out to your favorite classics! I would recommend this item!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 13, 2019
CommentsContent: I bought this for my wife who has some old albums she wants to play.  She was pretty amused that I bought the camo case version but luckily she has a sense of humor!  I wasn't expecting a lot from a $30 turntable but I was very pleasantly surprised!  The unit is nicely arranged, the build quality seems excellent and the sound quality and volume is quite good - okay, it's not the Boston Philharmonic, but it really is quite acceptable.  We even played some old Christmas LP's on it and were amazed at how well they sounded.  Money well spent - buy one!

CommentsTitle: Turntable wobbles. Many reported it. Don't buy.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 22, 2019
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   Search the Q&A for "wobble", and you'll find that many people reported concerns about having tio much wobble. I didn't notice those reviews/concerns prior to our chasing. The wobble can contribute to skipping or changes in playback rate.  I'm guessing some buyers got lucky and have less wobble than mine does.

CommentsTitle: No mute function for recording even if I do find a cable
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 3, 2021
CommentsContent: Received the product, set it up in 10 minutes, following directions (only a few) and using Audacity software I already had on my computer, was able to take an old album (33rpm) recorded it and edited out the noise, and saved as an mp3 file.  Sent that file to another email  account.  The playback was great!  I need to find a cable to connect from the audio out jacks on the turntable to the computer inputs.  I have to play the album out loud and voice capture via my computer's open mic so everyone needs to be quite quiet while I am recording.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 22, 2018
CommentsContent: i was super hyped to get this, i was going to surprise my parents by playing one of their old LPs but the original ac adapter did not work, i replaced it and it would turn on, but it does not play anything and the bluetooth doesn't do anything either.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 29, 2020
CommentsContent: Horrible tone. Sounds tiny. Bought two. Both have problems. One skips constatntly. The other has off speed sound on certain LPs. Both very poor speakers with a very tiny sound. I'd pay alittle more and shop another turntable.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 26, 2019
CommentsContent: The sound quality on this is terrible. Comparable to a $15 kids amp from the early 2000s. The needle skips horribly making this product essentially useless. The actually frame of the table that rests inside the casing is made from extremely cheap plastic and will flex with the slightest amount of pressure. They basically threw together the cheapest vinyl player imaginable and jammed it into a cool psychadelic case to sell it for way more than it's worth.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 11, 2019
CommentsContent: This record player does not work! Do not buy this! We bought it and opened it up for my Daughters birthday and it sounds like the speakers are blow, we spent 30 dollars on new speakers and it still did not work! Bad product!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2021
CommentsContent: Purchased for my 17 year old daughter for Christmas. At first she loved it since it played our old records, but the sound cranked up wasn’t loud. And the Bluetooth would not connect to play the music louder on our blue tooth speaker. After using only 3 times it stopped powering on, I purchased 3 cords and none would work. So disappointing, hoping I can still return it, enough though it was purchased before Christmas, it was not opened until after ugh

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 22, 2019
CommentsContent: I haven’t had much of a chance to use this since I purchased. Today and maybe the 6th or 7th time over months. When I started the record, the power shut off and I smelled a burn smell. It’s coming from inside the machine, though it’s not hot. Anyway,  point is the record player is busted after minimal use. So disappointed. This was a real waste of money.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 29, 2020
CommentsContent: Fantastic quality for the price. Everything works well. I don't know anything about turntables and my friend wanted one (she doesn't know anything either) so it was a great way to get into it without really having to make to much of an investment. I'm going to have to get myself one next!

CommentsTitle: beautiful and such a wonderful array of colors
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 12, 2021
CommentsContent: It was a gift for my daughter and that’s why I gave her the tie-dye one because she has all my albums from back in the tie-dye age so I had to bring it together to make her understand my bell bottom jeans day and anyway the album she put on first just worked perfectly so I’m so glad I bought this

CommentsTitle: Skips a ton.. sound quality isn't good
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 21, 2020
CommentsContent: I had high hopes for this player because the other reviews looked good, maybe the bad ones are buried idk, but this record player was a let down. I tried playing vinyls that were brand new and they skipped soooo much. I couldn't even listen to it, it was horrible. I thought maybe just the vinyls were bad so I put on a vinyl that I've had for a while and know for a FACT is in good condition with no scratches and it did the same thing. AVOID!!! Do yourself a favor and just find a record store near you, most of them sell record payers. Urban Outfitters also sells two brands that I've found to be pretty good - Boytone and Crosly. But avoid Victrola, don't waste the $$.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 9, 2020
CommentsContent: This is a Christmas gift for my daughter and it was delivered in a Victola box showing exactly what was inside. I never check the gift box because my kids don’t open my packages. Her surprise was ruined because of this. Disappointed but I’m sure she’ll love this turntable. I suppose I’m checking the gift box from now on. 😒

CommentsTitle: Sound quality is just not there, sounds disappointing
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 21, 2020
CommentsContent: The sound quality is pretty bad. By bad I mean I will never listen to it which defeats the whole purpose. I was pretty wary about buying it but read that other people hook it up to a different speaker&since we have a couple around the house I gave it a go. BUT, no matter what my boyfriend and I try, we cannot get it to connect to anything else! Read the instructions 100 times. I should have just returned it but didn’t want to go through the process. More decoration now than anything.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 11, 2018
CommentsContent: This thing is too cool!  It does what it’s supposed to do: it plays your records and oozes retro vibes whilst filling the room with sounds of yesterday!  I’m completely smitten with this simple, lightweight, portable piece of hardware.  It takes me back really quickly to a long-since passed time in my childhood.  It’s just really cool and reasonably priced.  I’m quite looking forward to a picnic now, lol!

CommentsTitle: Please don’t buy it, for your own sake
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 16, 2021
CommentsContent: Sound quality was definitely not the best, and the needle kept skipping so much even though all my records were fine, I switched to a new record player and all my older records (which I used on this one) sounded perfectly. So if you’re a beginner, please don’t buy this, it will scratch your records and will not sound good, please save up for a better record player and do some research, :)

CommentsTitle: You get what you pay for! Good product
CommentsAuthor: That one dude from that place the other day
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 9, 2018
CommentsContent: All in all it's okay, you get what you pay for. It's kind of cheap, mine arrived with the needle partially popped off and it won't play records with closely spaced grooves, not sure if these are related. I plan on ordering a better one from the same company, this is the third record player I've had from them and this is the only one I've experienced a problem with but it's still good for travel and very compact which helps me a lot at the moment.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 16, 2020
CommentsContent: We wanted a record player for our young son, so we didn't need something with amazing sound quality. Just something simple & fun that WORKS, and this fits the bill. The sound quality is mediocre through the small speakers, but the player itself seems to work well (except one of our records with smoother grooves does skip). Definitely recommended considering the price point. And our son loves it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 30, 2020
CommentsContent: If you are looking for retro this record player is it. Right out of the box I plugged this in with my daughter and was very disappointed when I saw the speaker plug in the back thinking this was the only way to hear sound. Low and behold this is just an additional way. The sound reminds me of records playing back in the day. This is a great affordable piece of nostalgia and I do not regret this purchase. One additional this is it comes with the adapter for the 45’s with the wide hole. Enjoy😊

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2020
CommentsContent: This bluetooth turntable looks nice - and that's about it.  Mine worked once and then stopped.  And it specifically stopped working just when I needed it to work.Victrola customer service suggested the following: go out and buy a new needle, add a counterweight to the arm, try to balance another way.Amazon support suggested bringing it in for repairs.Second time I went to use it, turntable would rotate 60 degrees, stop, rotate another 60 degrees, and then stop.,  Power light would go on and off.  No sound whatsoever.You get what you pay for.

CommentsTitle: it worked great. We went out and bought a bunch of ...
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2018
CommentsContent: We were really excited about this record player but didn’t get a chance to use it until recently since we didn’t have a place for it (bought it as a Christmas gift). The first time we used it, it worked great. We went out and bought a bunch of records. The second time we used it, the sound was completely off. The mechanism that moves the arm does not adjust. Despite adjusting the speed settings, we still get too fast or too slow. It’s  useless now. And the return window has closed. Super disappointed.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 2, 2019
CommentsContent: This is a great record player, except I ended up having to tape a nickel onto the stylus to add weight and keep it from skipping, before I did that it would skip constantly and made it painful to hear my favorite songs so butchered, but after adding the nickel, I haven’t had any skipping issues, so yeah, it just needs a little love, 5 cents and tape

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 11, 2020
CommentsContent: Ordered for a Christmas gift, wanted to check the sound quality. Sound quality was okay. Loud was not that loud for a regular speaker. Order arrived on time. Everything was good about the order it was just the product itself that I found did not work for the price. I'd suggest buying from a different seller if looking for something with more quality (could have just been my product with the sound deficit). The price may be higher, but it is worth it.

CommentsTitle: Nice little phonograph with surprisingly good sound.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 22, 2021
CommentsContent: Plays vintage vinyl well, has an additional needle, great if you are an intermittent listener of records, very well made and good sound for the money.

CommentsTitle: Great to have fun, not so great sound, Bluetooth was a bummer
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 10, 2021
CommentsContent: It's been fun to have the Victrola to play old records that we had in the house.Pros:It's easy to use and understand.It's fun to use.Cons:The sound quality is not great.The Bluetooth connectivity is to play music from your cellphone through the Victrola, and not to pair it with a better sounding speaker.I had to connect it with an aux cord to a speaker using the headphones jack to have better quality. For some reason, a little-sounding-music still comes out from the Victrola when connected to the aux cord, but nothing that affects the overall sound.I would recommend it if you are not looking for the best quality, but more to have some fun and rediscover old records.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 25, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased this for my little brother's birthday. He is 26, has autism, and LOVES records. I am pretty sure this stopped the show for him. It was very easy for him to use, we didn't even need to look at the instructions. He takes it all over the house. The only down side is that it still has to be plugged in somewhere. However, as long as there is an outlet, there is music!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 11, 2021
CommentsContent: i'll start by saying i saw a review about this same problem, but thought "what are the odds it happens to me, most reviews are good". but on literally my first use of the record player, smoke started pouring out along with this terrible electric urning smell. i naturally unplugged it, and hoped it was just a fluke. when i went to try a second time, the record player stopped turning on altogether. can't even begin to express my disappointment, i didn't even get one use out of this piece of crap. do yourself a favor and don't waste your time or money on this junk. and also how is victrola even allowed to continue selling these at this point??? this is a major fire waiting to happen.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 22, 2019
CommentsContent: I had hoped this would be a nice addition to my art studio so that I could play my old vinyl records while painting. Sadly, I have to agree with those who have said the sound quality is poor. There is no way to adjust for treble and bass and it just sounds tinny. Very disappointed.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 23, 2020
CommentsContent: I just wish the Bluetooth would let you listen to the player via bluetooth headphones.  Instead, you can send your music to this player (which doesn't have the greatest speakers for this).

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 4, 2020
CommentsContent: The turntable is light weight and super user friendly. Just plug it in and enjoy. The the built-in speakers are good for your older records. My little portable speaker plugs right into the headphone jack if I want to listen to something bass heavy. Multiple options for audio if you have a sound system. The case is thick and it's packaged well. Comes with an extra needle and a 45 adapter. Love love love this turntable, and it's a really good price.

CommentsTitle: Works well but doesn’t come with power adapter.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 21, 2021
CommentsContent: I couldn’t find a belt for my old record player so I bought this instead.  I’m so happy with it.  I finally get to listen to my records again.  It’s volume is quite impressive for smaller record player.  It didn’t come with a power adapter but I had one lying around my house that worked perfectly.  The Bluetooth works well but I personally like the sound of the record player much better.  The Bluetooth makes it sound too perfect where I like the feel of the record player old school sounds.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2020
CommentsContent: Disappointed this came in original package only - no extra box or protection... Box came damaged with a hole in the side.  Son had volume issues when playing his new vinyls after opening for Xmas - Bluetooth volume worked fine so speakers are good.  Hopeful replacement is sent more protected and we have better luck as original reviewers shared...

CommentsTitle: This is not a good record player
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 21, 2018
CommentsContent: The only pro about this record player is that is highly portable. Most everything about it is terrible. Sounded very thin through the speakers themselves, so I hooked up the RCA to my bose system. This thing takes out every bit of low end. There is literally no bass, and the thing sounds like its coming through tweeters. I will be returning this item, in hopes of something more true to the music.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 14, 2020
CommentsContent: I've read other reviews saying their turntables die over time. For now it's really great. It plays as its supposed to. The speakers aren't amazing but honestly as long as I can listen to it I really dont care. As for portability it would be portable if it could be used without being plugged in but its more portable than a turntable with the entire setup so I guess theres that.I'll update in a week then a month to see if it's still working as well ✌🏽

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 18, 2020
CommentsContent: "I cant find a plus for this item. Bad quality, bad package, bad sound quality and bad customer service.It stopped working after 2 days, and maybe it should be a toy instead of a electronic product.Definitely return."

CommentsTitle: I works great and looks amazing!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 20, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this as a present and they absolutely love it. It looks great and works great. They loved the diversity of playing Vinyl and using it as a bluetooth speaker. As for the sellers, amazing and very responsive. We had an issue with the 1st one and they took care of it and sent us a replacement right away. We thank you for caring about your customers!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 25, 2018
CommentsContent: Ordered from the Amazon warehouse. Gave to my husband for Christmas so he could play his late father's records. We were so excited to use it but to our disappointment there was no wire in the box to plug it in. Now we have to order the wire separately.Update: I ordered the correct wire and the record player does not work at all. I do not recommend at all!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 23, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this for our 5 year old granddaughter, she absolutely loves it.  She changes the records and dances around singing all the time at her home.  She is so excited to share her musics with everyone.  Her little brother is 1 1/2 and he loves to come into  her room and dance around with her while she sings and played her albums.  Her favorite album is Mamma Mia soundtrack from the movie.

CommentsTitle: Use this ONLY as a decoration!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 20, 2020
CommentsContent: It's obviously cheap, so there's no question that it's not going to produce top notch sound. But the sound is TERRIBLE, even with external speakers hooked up to it. So if you're at all interested in quality sound, steer clear from this thing.It DOES look kinda cool and trendy when there's a record on it, but because of the heavy arm on the player due to cheap parts, it'll do more damage to your vinyl and cause more distortion. So either use it with records you don't give a damn about or put your microwave plate on this instead and let that spin.If you just want something to display in a room as a decoration piece, this is PERFECT!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   I recently destroyed an older portable phonograph during a move and purchased this as a replacement. I tested out the Bluetooth connection and it worked without a hitch. The built in speakers are loud without much bass. The arm is so light it skips quite a bit but I solved it with a very small and light glass figurine. A nickel also works.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 10, 2020
CommentsContent: As some of the reviews mentioned, the quality is not great. The record will skip and sound warped. I had to exchange for a different player and having the same exact issue with this one too. Disappointing, because I've purchased Victorella record players in the past and they worked great. Something about this model is just off. So be careful!

CommentsTitle: Good little portable player for headphone listener.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 22, 2019
CommentsContent: Good quality overall. Ok sound from the built in speakers, they do well for what they are. Headphone quality was great with both my open ear headphones and ear buds. Have only had it for a week, but it has not had any issues.The one con I would say is, the wrap on the unit looks and feels like duct tape. It's cute, but kinda felt like it was a teenager's record player that their parent gave away when they found an Alice Cooper vinyl in their Pat Boone holder.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 6, 2021
CommentsContent: This product is advertised as a Bluetooth record player. The obvious implication of that is a record player that can play through Bluetooth. There's not what this product is. It is not a Bluetooth record player at all, it is a record player that also happens to have a Bluetooth speaker. This is incredibly misleading to the point where you can reasonably say it's false advertising, and if I knew this was going to be how it functioned, I would not have bought this product. I will be reporting this to Amazon.

CommentsTitle: Not sure why this is "Amazon Choice," not a great buy
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2019
CommentsContent: Phone quality speakers and cannot play an entire record without needle skipping. My first disappointing "Amazon Choice" purchase. I should have known better for the price point, but for some reason Amazon is backing this low tier item. Spend the extra money and get a better machine.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 25, 2019
CommentsContent: I love this so much. I asked for it for Christmas and was so happy to see that I got it. It plays my Harry Styles record beautifully. The sound quality is very sharp and smooth and it’s also easy to connect to Bluetooth, making it sound way better than just using your cell phone’s speaker. The set up, fyi, is much easier than I thought it would be. It’s also a beautiful color. I love it so much. Now I just need to buy some records

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 17, 2018
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   Originally gave it a 1 Star bc I thought it didn’t come with the power chord and no one from customer service had gotten back to me. Now I’m back. We found the power chord and thought everything would be fine but no. It. Doesn’t. Work. I’m so annoyed and upset that i wasted my money on this.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 10, 2019
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   The record player is as described and it is extremely portable. If I weren't able to hook up speakers to it I would be sending it back. Imagine your phone speaker but being able to turn it up louder that is the sound quality. I can't complain because it did not advertise robust sound however I will be connecting better speakers to it. Other than that it does everything it's advertise to do and for that I can't complain. It's 40 bucks.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 13, 2019
CommentsContent: It gets way too "static-y" when you turn the volume past the half point. It's a great and fantastic Vinyl Record Player. I've had a couple in the past and this one is the best. The first was a Victrola Vinly to CD player/Converter, that was too large and bulky to set anywhere, so I gave to my grandma, second one was a Cosby and it was a hunk of plastic crap. But this one? This one is a show stealer, with its bright and vibrant colors, and it's retro style look with its brief case, well, case. It's makes its mark as center piece in my room, allows me to play music I could very well play on Google or Spotify, but it's gives me pleasure to hear so clearly and beautifully on this machine. Fantastic product, Victrola never ceases to amaze me.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 10, 2021
CommentsContent: Purchased for my daughter, The first one worked great but stopped spinning after one week. I purchased another while that was being replaced. That one never worked, not even out of the box! Hopefully the replacement works since she’s got a large vinyl collection now but a huge disappointment regardless. Just put a few extra dollars towards one that works.

CommentsTitle: Easy to use, and great quality
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 1, 2021
CommentsContent: I gave this to my 73yo Dad for Christmas,  and he LOVES it! He's been listening to records he hasn't heard in almost 20 years. I'm not sure about the sound quality as he immediately figured out how to hook them up to a Bose speaker his girlfriend gave him via the aux port.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 15, 2018
CommentsContent: This record player is a lot of fun!  I love the color and it's a great size for my living room bookshelf.  I like that I'm able to play a variety of record speeds and it's very user-friendly -- thankfully, because it's my first record player!  The Bluetooth connection took some time initially, but it works well.  The only drawback is I wish it had a bit more bass in the speakers.  For older records and classical music, it's fine, but for music where I'm expecting a bit more of a punch, I find it lacking.  Otherwise, it's been a great purchase!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 12, 2019
CommentsContent: I purchased this item for my grandchildren along with some nostalgic records I had when I was a child. When I played the 78 rpm record, the player stopped 3/4 of the way through the record. I tried over and over to play the record, same result. The record was not damaged. Support was unable to help me so I returned the player as defective.

CommentsTitle: The right side speaker doesn't work.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 27, 2017
CommentsContent: I bought this as a gift for myself. I waited until I bought a record stand to set it up.The sound wasn't that loud, so that was a little frustrating. After listening closely, i realized that the right side speaker doesn't even work. I spent a lot of time trying to find a record player that had a good brand name, okay sound quality and was of a light blue color. So this was very disappointing to me.  This was also after shipping issues. It was sent to the wrong address. I went to the address the postal carrier dropped it off to and it wasn't there. I had to call and request for another to be sent, only to have someone bring it to me because my address was on it. I canceled the new one being shipped. So after shipping issues and then product issues, I don't think i'll be buying electronics from Amazon again.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 17, 2020
CommentsContent: Don’t waste your money on high end record player this is amazing . Great sound easy to hook up . I bough a 375 dollars record player and it was so painful to put together then hooked it up to speakers  and amp on high volume it was like being at my grandma house no sound ..  Had to return . I bought this one no complaints .

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 31, 2020
CommentsContent: This was a gift for our Granddaughter and she is quite happy with it. All works as described and it has performed flawlessly thus far.  Would highly reccomend it to whoever is thinking about a portableplayer as this. There is a real movement back to vinyl Lp format so don’t wait. This is a very economical way to help your friend or family member to step back in time and forward to to the future again.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 24, 2020
CommentsContent: We got this for my daughter for her birthday and it skipped all over the place on all records played - and these were albums that play just fine on my turntable (different manufacturer). After contacting the manufacturer for advice we ended up returning this piece of junk. It's very poorly-made - cheap, light plastics throughout. It looks nice, but isn't worth it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 19, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   Where can I start😂 I’m honestly in love with this thing. I bought a few records with it,m and immediately set it up when it got here. It’s lightweight, portable, great construction, great sound quality, and very easy to set up. I would definitely recommend to anyone starting out with record players

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 19, 2021
CommentsContent: Love the look of it both open and closed.  I got a separate speaker and connected directly because I wasn't sure how to get the bluetooth working with existing speakers I had.  The built in speakers work well but you don't get a lot of volume.  It sounds great on my speaker and I have a vintage look in the room.  Its an excellent purchase for those new to vinyl.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 9, 2020
CommentsContent: As soon as I took it out of the box, I loved the white and rose gold color. I knew it wasn’t the most expensive record player but I expected it to work. The record wobbles ( I was told this is common with free standing/floating), but the needle just skips across the whole record! I then bought a cork underlay non skip mat. Still wobbly, still won’t play the record. I’m at a loss.

CommentsTitle: Don't believe the good reviews; this is a low-quality product.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 2, 2020
CommentsContent: Do not buy it! I've never purchased my own record player and based my choice from the overwhelmingly good reviews. That was my big mistake. This item is a low-quality product that will ruin your records, at first I thought the product was just defective but after I did some research I found it was cheap & poorly made. Save your money and buy a more reputable brand.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2020
CommentsContent: Broke after 1 week...stopped suddenly. Distorted sound，Turn on the turntable and no sound came from it even I turn it up to full volume. I tried another new adaptor but it was still not working. They sent another one but the 2nd one was also broken after a few week's uses... Plan to buy another brand.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 14, 2021
CommentsContent: I like the looks of the player. Easy to carry. The sound is lacking. Not very loud but it is good enough for my husband to sit in the same room and hear it. I gave it four stars for sound quality. We like it because it serves its purpose for us without investing a lot of money.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 13, 2020
CommentsContent: I gave this to my daughter over a year ago and at my request she finally opened it up. We plug it in and put a 331/3 record on. The turntable does not go a the correct speed. Too late to return so I called the manufacturer's customer service. They told me to enter my phone number and they would call back...never heard from them.

CommentsTitle: DO NOT BUY THIS! What a nightmare
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 2, 2019
CommentsContent: I’m so annoyed because I literally bought this and had to get a return for another one because it wouldn’t even turn on. Then my replacement came and the table is warped so it skips and jumps the whole time. What a hassle.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 27, 2020
CommentsContent: While the record player worked, it was great! Bought this for my daughter as a Christmas gift and it worked great and had great sound until 3 months later it just quit powering on. With the craziness or quarantining and everything I am just now reaching out to Victrola for a replacement since it’s still under the one year manufacturers warranty. Fingers crossed but I’m not hopeful after reading other reviewers comments stating it the worst customer service ever!! I will update my review as it changes.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2018
CommentsContent: I ordered this to play my old vinyls and bought some new. Qualified for free shipping and it came in two days. The tye dye color is absolutely stunning. I’m plying new LPs and old. No skipping. The sound is incredible. I thought I would use Bluetooth speakers but do not need it. This is perfect, compact, easy to set up. Comes with a 45 adapter. It’s programmed to stop at the end of the record. I have a small apt and can hear it in all rooms. And it’s barely turned up. Highly recommend! Also you can connect your iPhone or iPad to it to listen to music via Bluetooth. It comes with an extra needle. I just love it.

CommentsTitle: bought as a birthday gift- would not function!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 18, 2020
CommentsContent: Item would power up, but turntable would not turn.  I bought it early and as a result, missed the return window.  Ugh, what a disappointment.  Box was pretty beat up upon arrival too.  I ended up going to best buy to purchase one on my friend's actual birthday after she was gifted several records that she could not play :(  Once I opened the new one, I realized that the one I bought from amazon was likely a return as many smaller protective components were gone (cover on needle, paper over the turntable, etc.

CommentsTitle: Purchase It if you love record players
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2021
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   I have another Record player and it’s nothing compared to this one I”m very happy with my purchased also for you flocks that love to read while listening to music 🎶 the sound is one point with a nice relaxing sound not over powering like some record players can be. Enjoy and become a happy customer like Me

CommentsTitle: Some flaws but overall an ok portable record player.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 11, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this record player for the portability factor and the brand. It’s overall a nice little record player. The original needle had a defect and caused poor sound quality. Switched it out with the spare one it came with and it seems ok now. The speakers are by no means high quality. Do not expect great sound like you do with a radio or car system. But they do sound ok for enjoying a record and that’s all you have. What is disappointing is when you hook up external speakers you can still hear sound out of the record player speakers. But overall it’s not too bad for the price.

CommentsTitle: Works good, but the speakers are garbage.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 27, 2019
CommentsContent: The record player works great for it's intended purpose, however the speakers are absolute junk. Unfortunately, it doesn't broadcast to Bluetooth speakers, so I was forced to plug in some marginally better computer speakers. I don't know why you'd ever use Bluetooth to broadcast TO this device considering how horrible the speakers are..might as well left the Bluetooth function off since you can't use it with Bluetooth speakers.

CommentsTitle: Not the best sound quality. You get your money’s worth.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 3, 2018
CommentsContent: I am happy with the functionality of this product & take advantage of the built in Bluetooth setting just as often as I use it to play my vinyl. The sound quality lessens a great deal once you turn the volume to greater than 50%. It is disappointing not to be able to enjoy the pleasantness of Joni Mitchell’s high notes & Bob Dylan on the harmonica..but I suppose it will work well with other musicians.  I guess I would suggest purchasing your own speakers if you are going to buy this product.Overall very cute and aesthetically pleasing, everything else is marginal.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 29, 2020
CommentsContent: We purchased this product over a year ago and never used it due to not having any records for it, so when we just recently purchased a record we were so excited to finally try it out only to find no cord with it and when we did purchase a replacement cord (that was for this specific product with matched watt) it wouldn’t even turn on. Because we waited so long to use it all the support told us they can’t do anything for us. I loved the initial look of this but I really wouldn’t recommend purchasing. There’s no reason a brand new product that was never used shouldn’t have worked.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 9, 2021
CommentsContent: The Bluetooth connection is purely for connecting to their low grade speakers coming out of the case. You would think that the Bluetooth would connect to something else but as far as I can tell it only receives Bluetooth.. not transmits. But for being a cheap record player it does the job.. I had to tape a quarter to the headshell though..

CommentsTitle: Over all it we loved it
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 14, 2021
CommentsContent: We loved the product over all we just had an issue that we received the wrong color, no biggie right.. I contacted Amazon so they can replace it with the right color and we sent that one back. In a few days we received the new one still in red.. my daughter wanted grey. She ended up just keeping it because she had been wanting one for a long time and didn’t want to wait any longer. Other than that we loved the Player. It’s awesome and works great 😊

CommentsTitle: Horrible experience. Don’t buy used.. ever.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 12, 2020
CommentsContent: It wasn’t working right from the beginning. When the turn table finally turned for more than a few minutes, it started smoking and died completely. In a panic, my husband grabbed it before if caught fire and threw it out the door. Never returned because it was horribly damaged and my husband threw it away.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 19, 2018
CommentsContent: I bought this maybe 4 months ago and just opened it now. My bad.However the vinyl or the holder the vinyl sits on is wobbly so the vinyl is not playing properly. It just sounds like a broken radio station with everyone tuning in.Will continue to test. If the next vinyl I try sounds like this AND wobbles as much, will have to keep 1 star and try a different player.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 14, 2020
CommentsContent: This is the first record player I have bought. My boyfriend had a bunch of vinyls with the plan to sell them so I got this to test them out, make sure they played. It worked really well in my opinion but only for about 6 weeks. It stopped turning on randomly one day. I could turn the power knob and hear it click like it was trying to turn on but nothing else would happen. I read in the reviews that the power adapter could be replaced to possibly fix that problem but that didn't work for me. A new adapter didn't make any difference. This review has three stars because like I said, it did work well for a little while. It's nothing fancy, but I do wish it had lasted longer.

CommentsTitle: Will not turn on even after ordering a replacement adapter
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2021
CommentsContent: I bought this for our new apartment since I have always wanted a record player. I plugged it in once and it worked just fine. The next day I tried to turn it on and it would not turn on or work at all. I tried plugging it into multiple outlets but it still did not work. I ended up ordering a replacement 5v ac adapter and it still would not turn on. It seems I have received a defective player. I am currently in the process of returning it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 19, 2018
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   Well....it doesn’t work. Hopefully the return goes smoothly. I bought this for my in-laws for Christmas so this is disappointing. Spent about 30 minutes trying to get it to do anything and finally it just did what’s in the video.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 19, 2018
CommentsContent: I literally just received my package with this item in, it I immediately set it up. All I needed to listen to was one song and I then took it apart and repackaged it because it's going back. The sound quality on this thing is no better than a tiny bluetooth speaker that you can get at Five Below or something. Very disappointing. But it was very cute!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 3, 2017
CommentsContent: I've had several record players over the years with varying price tags, this being the cheapest of them all. And while many may think less price equals less quality this is certainly not the case with this product! This is a high quality three speed record player with built in speakers (very convenient) and the Bluetooth compatibility is a huge plus! All of the color options are very cute and I love how compact it is.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 1, 2019
CommentsContent: This is a great option for a suitcase player! I’m generally very happy with this purchase - it’s a good affordable starter record player for people just getting into vinyl. My only issue was that the needle was broken (not just displaced) when it arrived. So glad i t comes with a spare so I was able to change it. I just wish I could have saved the spare needle for when the first one wears out

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 22, 2019
CommentsContent: Ordered one style of turntable...but received a completely different one in the mail.Was expecting the all red turntable but instead opened the box and found an American flag turntable. Really doesn’t make sense. This package also arrived in a damaged Victrola box.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 1, 2021
CommentsContent: The price was cheap and it doesn't require much space is why I like it. The sound is poor, but I only purchased it to occasionally play old records after my better Victrola died. It is ok, but I would purchase better if I had realized the sound quality.

CommentsTitle: Go for it worth the money.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 30, 2018
CommentsContent: This record player is awesome and has a classic sound. It is great for playing old records I have some old records from the 1920s 12inch 78 rpm it makes them sound great. As for the volume I have hearing issues and have no problem hearing this player throughout the house. Possibly one of the best audio buys I have made in a while (for what it is )Don’t expect extra high quality sound just nice mellow analog sound and you are set. Great for some ambiance / background sound while doing work around the house or just relaxing

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 21, 2021
CommentsContent: The Victrola arrived with no damages, however, the sound on the actual record player did not work. It was very muffled, only coming out of one speaker (barely) and didn't change in volume regardless of what level the volume was set. Everything was plugged in correctly. Sent it back immediately for replacement. Hoping the next one works, but my first impression was terrible - look elsewhere for a higher quality record player.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 11, 2019
CommentsContent: It sounded like a good deal, but it didn't end up that way - no trauma or damage occurred and yet the turntable (integral part) no longer moves after a month:(

CommentsTitle: Mom & Dad’s music brought back to life!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 1, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   What to do with your parents’ classic albums that you heard over and over when you were a kid??? Play them!!! This record player is inexpensive, stylish, and very retro cool. It blends perfectly with our recently renovated mid-century home. The turquoise color is fabulously nostalgic. Sounds great for the price.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 7, 2021
CommentsContent: This record player is adorable. It looks amazing with my room, it’s really intuitive, and i get compliments on it. Thank you!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 14, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this as a gift for my husbands birthday. I purchased in June and his Birthday is sept. (2020)  we took out of box, set up according to instructions. the Bluetooth hooks up,  but turn table will not more. If we turn knob back to Phono NO Bluetooth.  Have tried several time with several different blue tooth compatible equipment, all works  its just not allowing the turn table to work while in Bluetooth mode and no Bluetooth is we turn back to phono mod.  I know I am past my return date but would like to as anyway for a refund..

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 17, 2019
CommentsContent: My 10-year-old recently discovered a record player with broken speakers in my parent's basement.  While I wasn't convinced he would love LPs long-term, I was tired of watching him intently listen with his ear to the needle of my parents record player.  I bought him this record player and he can't get enough of it!  It has decent sound and he really enjoys using it as a bluetooth speaker when he wants to switch to his digital music.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 24, 2019
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   Worst Christmas gift ever! Easy to set up but the sound quality is horrible. The needle would jump all over the place even using a brand new record. Returning right away and buying and Audio Technica brand instead!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 10, 2018
CommentsContent: I purchased this for my grandchildren ( 6 & 4 yrs. old).  I kept their mom's records from her childhood for them to play.  They absolutely love it.  I had it as a surprise when they came to visit and they did take it home with them.  I was just there for a visit and my grandson was playing with it and enjoying it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 2, 2021
CommentsContent: Do not waste your money on this record player! Sound is TERRIBLE. I am two days too late to return this, darn it. I thought I could route it through an external speaker and had to wait for cord to arrive....not only did cord not work but now I missed my opportunity to return this poor excuse of a record player

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 5, 2020
CommentsContent: Plays well.  The telescopic arm was great when we got it but for some reason we have to move the arm to the record now.  I am not for sure if it is us or the record player.  It is still a 5 because it did not cost much and it plays very well.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 16, 2019
CommentsContent: The plastic plate was broken and the needle moved in all directions this sound was horrible and it seemed like the internal part of the record player was either poorly manufactured or broken

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2019
CommentsContent: ***UPDATE*** I was able to contact the manufacturer via Amazon. They were helpful suggesting the cord might be bad. They wasted no time sending me a new one and it works just fine. I still only did 4 stars because I'm still mystified why you would want to run bluetooth into the record player as opposed to out of it. I am happy and it is good for a kids record player.ORIGINAL REVIEW: Stopped working after 55 days with no abuse to the player in the least bit. Of course it was outside the return window so now I'm stuck with poop. It also has a Bluetooth but you would think that it would be so you could connect to a better speaker. It's actually the opposite. You can connect your phone and whatnot via Bluetooth to play through the speakers. Why on Earth anyone would want to use these speakers other than for the record player itself I'll never understand. The speakers suck and not much better than your phone speaker. Find a better player and spend a little more if you have to.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 12, 2019
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   It's almost a little difficult to hear in the video, but the sound quality on this turntable is absolutely horrendous. My brand new vinyl records sound lower than I usually hear them and distorted. I'm so disappointed, as I've wanted one of these for some time.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 15, 2019
CommentsContent: Very disappointed as this was a Christmas gift. The durability is poor. Two of the metal corner covers on the outside come off upon opening and taking the player out of the box.  An expensive item to purchase only to receive defective and poor quality.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 16, 2021
CommentsContent: I bought this to replace a dud I'd bought locally. This one works great! It's sturdy and the design colors pop. It doesn't look drab and washed out. We bought it for our daughter. And she flipped when she saw the design. Also, it doesn't feel rickety when you move it around. Everything just feels so solid and well built.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 31, 2019
CommentsContent: Wow, I am impressed. For the price this is a great record player. I seldom write reviews, but I made this an exception because of the "fit and finish" and quality of the sound for the price. I have only used it for a few days, so at this time I can't really speak to the quality, but by what I can evaluate, it is a quality item. Now the fidelity and base would not compare to a $10,000 system I have heard.... but for the price, it is equivalent to some much more expensive systems.Seldom do I recommend products, but at this point in time, this item is an exception. I have not yet tried the Bluetooth connectivity. Thanks Victrola Vintage for a well done product.PS I did buy the service agreement.

CommentsTitle: TERRIBLE sound quality! Not even worth $40
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 9, 2020
CommentsContent: HORRIBLE sound quality! My 30 year old record player and needle are better which I was trying to replace. I heard the motor through the speakers of the stereo I plugged it into. Don't recommend unless you're trying to mimic old tinny radio sound. Didn't even try the blue tooth cuz, who cares if the record player sucks.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 30, 2019
CommentsContent: The player constantly skipped, no matter which record was playing.  Tried several brand new records, and a different needle.  They all skipped.  Also, I found out that the needles these inexpensive players use ruin your record albums.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 23, 2019
CommentsContent: Can't handle any record pretty much without skipping, staticy sound, or just terrible audio quality. Don't waste your money.

CommentsTitle: Cannot use with an external bluetooth speakar
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 17, 2020
CommentsContent: I was hoping to sink this with an external bluetooth speaker to augment the sound quality. Instead it can act as an external bluetooth speaker which is odd because I wanted to use it to play records, which it does fine, although it can skip, just like the old days.

CommentsTitle: Super cute for starting fires inside
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 3, 2021
CommentsContent: Not really sure about sound quality...plugged it in, turned it on, put a record on, 10 seconds later it started smoking and sparks were coming out from under the record. Thankfully my son is a firefighter and was able to quickly shut the lid, get it unplugged and out of the house before the fire spread.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2019
CommentsContent: Returned for refund.I gave this as a gift. I was embarrassed when I heard how poor the sound quality was. Figured it would improve witha bluetooth connected speaker. Could not get it to synch with any of three speakers. To their credit, the seller refundedmy purchase amount quickly. I do not understand how this has so many positive reviews.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 23, 2021
CommentsContent: I have an extensive vinyl collection from my teenage years that I wanted to dispose of and my husband insisted I get this turntable so he could listen to them.  I am not crazy about the sound quality but he likes it so mission accomplished

CommentsTitle: Very Nice Player and good value for the Money
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 26, 2020
