CommentsContent: This is a really nice record player. The sound quality is what it is for the size of the speakers so don't expect hi-fi sound. However, there are a stereo pair RCA phono jacks output on the back of the player that you can connected to an external sound system for much better quality sound. You can also use the player as a bluetooth pass-thru. It's a very nice looking player that comes with a spare needle good for 50 hours according to the documentation. Unfortunately we decided to return it because my son thinks dealing with records is too much hassle.

CommentsTitle: Cute Record player that plays well.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 25, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   Shipped super fast. Like in less than 24 hours. Beautiful color! So far I played 2 different records and they played well. No skipping or issues.  Sound is ok I will try it with different speakers. So far so good for me. I will keep you posted.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2020
CommentsContent: I got the British design one...My husband was soo shocked and excited when I gave this to him for Christmas!! He loves it, I love it...easy to use...sound quality & noise level is great for any size record and better than expected!! He Loves the look of it

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 27, 2021
CommentsContent: This record player is affordable and if you just want it for decor it’s great but if you try to listen to anything on this record player you will be very disappointed. Very poor sound quality on mine. Get the higher priced item and do yourself a favor.

CommentsTitle: Amazing record player for the price
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 1, 2021
CommentsContent: This is my very first record player ever and think it’s really good. The build quality is very solid and it actually sounds pretty good, the only complaint I have about the sound is I wish it got a bit louder but other than that the sound is very clear.

CommentsTitle: My Mom can listen to her Beatles records whenever!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2018
CommentsContent: I bought this as a Christmas present for my mom to play her old Beatles albums on. It was easy to set up and she was playing records instantly.The sound isn't perfect but you can connect it to a better sounding Bluetooth speaker for optimum quality. I expected as much from this so I purchased a speaker to go along with the record player.Overall I am satisfied with this product. It does what it says it's going to do.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 30, 2019
CommentsContent: This is an awesome little portable turntable!  My husband and I literally threw away dozens of vinyl albums in the 1990s and have started to replenish with a few classics.  I would say if you’re a very serious vinyl collector then you should go with something a bit more “hardy.”  But for the money and occasional use it is just perfect! Cute color,  too!

CommentsTitle: Order was wrong but good record player for the price
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 24, 2021
CommentsContent: Ordered the American Flag design and received the Dark Red design. I could return it it but it’s not worth the hassle and I don’t care that much about the color. Other than that it is exactly what I expect. It’s a great product for the price.

CommentsTitle: Had to return three of these same designs
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 25, 2020
CommentsContent: I do not know what the issue is with this world map design album player, but I have two other designs that work perfectly unlike this one. The upsetting part is this is a Christmas present my granddaughter picked out because it matching her bedroom, but I refuse to go thru this again for the fourth time to have to return it also.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2020
CommentsContent: Purchased for granddaughter end of July.  Played old vinyl great.  Just purchased new vinyl for Christmas and it will not play without skipping.  Company advised it’s not made to play new vinyl grade albums and to try to switch out needles, still skips. It doesn’t state that exception on site, description on Amazon, or in manual.  90 day warranty up now.  Bought second one for my other granddaughter for Christmas.  Returned it because it skipped.  Replacement received.  It skips too!  Guess it’s going back unless someone has any suggestions to get this to work??

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 25, 2021
CommentsContent: I bought this for my grandfather because he has a old collection of records but he did not own a record player. He adored this gift! He uses it several times a week and has recently purchased a Victrola record case to match the record player.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 29, 2020
CommentsContent: My first vinyl player and I love it! There was a piece that had been dislodged during shipping so the vinyls would not spin (a plastic piece to the circle part next to the turn table) but I got it and put it back and it works great!

CommentsTitle: I've gone through three in less than a year!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 26, 2019
CommentsContent: For the first few uses it works GREAT...but then it breaks. You don't even have to do anything for it to break, one day you just try to use it and it doesn't work. I've been building my collection and I was using it regularly and when I tried to play a new record, it wouldn't work. This is the third time it's happened in less than a year. You'd be better off not buying this at all.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 16, 2020
CommentsContent: I’ve been wanting a record player for a long time. Had a great time listening to all the new and old records handed down to me from my family and sharing that experience with my 7 year old son.  The sound quality is what you would expect out of the tiny speakers, but I had no problems hooking it up through my surround sound. Very pleased with this purchase.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 7, 2019
CommentsContent: For this price the number of functions you get the sound quality cant be matched. Victrola blows crosley out of the water on build and sound quality. Probably every other tiny table maker as well. Yes 3 star sound. Because its not an audiophile system. Hut for what youre buying it is 5 star sound for sure. You can actually dance to the bass from these tiny speakers. And it tracks better as well. Just bought 3 more as gifts.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 17, 2021
CommentsContent: Made in China. Cheap junk. Played three records and then, the speed got stuck, that is, no matter what speed I changed it to, it spun on the 78 speed! Tried everything, followed the manual. Forget it! Don't waste your time or money.

CommentsTitle: Brings joy to my music corner!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 9, 2018
CommentsContent: Great product! I love the vintage/modern style and it plays my aged and new vinyl records very well! If your looking for a quality record player to get you started in listening to vinyl I highly recommend this product.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 14, 2020
CommentsContent: Highly Dissatisfied! The Bluetooth connectivity has been nothing but staticy and it constantly disconnects from my phone through the day. I was originally looking forward to this as I've been working from home and love listening to music all day. During the day I use the Bluetooth to play music while being at my desk all day long, didn't have many issues the first few days but a now the bluetooth is no longer working. I waited 3 weeks for this to ship and this is what I get.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 30, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas so that she could listen to her grandparents old LP's and she loves it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 4, 2020
CommentsContent: The portability of this record player is great. It’s also really cute but those 2 pros are out weighted by the fact that this is a cheaply made product. All of the vinyls are played on it skipped like crazy. Some even got stuck. The lift needle broke after the second use so this is basically useless and I had to return it.

CommentsTitle: Wanted to love it so bad, but I culdn't
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 30, 2018
CommentsContent: This thing would be the "pop, crackle and skip" of turntable cereals. I ordered despite the reviews hoping Id be one of the lucky folks to get one that functions well, and at best I got something half-decent. It pops, crackles and skips like nobody's business. It's definitely a "you get what you pay for" situation, but I suppose it does fine as an introduction to turntables, if you're ignorant to this sort of thing. At the very least now I know what to look for in reviews. Wouldn't recommend this one, although it's got some fine portability to it. It's quite small and very light, definitely not a pain to carry around at all. Downside is that it needs a powerplug to work, so you're kind of limited where you can set it up. Overall it's...decent for the price, so if you're looking for something to just get you into the scene without having to shart out big dollars, this would be the one.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 9, 2019
CommentsContent: this record player is amazing! it’s super cute and it’s played all my records without problems. the sound quality is obviously not the absolute best, but it’s not horrible by any means! i’ve had this for about three weeks now and i love it and use it every day.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 30, 2019
CommentsContent: I bought this unit because I figured I just needed a turntable again, after my previous one broke. Other than there being poor sound quality with the built-in speakers, the arm of the player does not add enough pressure, causing it to skip during every song multiple times. I could add a penny through the old hack but I don't want to gouge my records. Overall, I would not suggest this unit--spring for something more quality.

CommentsTitle: Arrived not working, brother fixed, now works great
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 22, 2018
CommentsContent: I would have given this 5 stars if it hadn't been in pieces right out of the box. It looked great, but it would not work, and I couldn't figure out why. Finally my brother unscrewed the cover and found that NOTHING was connected inside! All the little wires and plugs were just hanging there! He's very smart and was able to put it all together and now it works great, but without him I would have ended up sending it back.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 12, 2020
CommentsContent: I got this for my mom for christmas a year or so back and she LOVES IT. She uses it almost every day and she was so happy that she gets to listen to her old records again. The only complaints she's had is that the max volume isn't super loud and it could use some more bass. But overall it's a great gift to give.

CommentsTitle: Did not work. Speed played too slow. Would not recommend
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 25, 2019
CommentsContent: Got it for Christmas but didn’t have a record to use it.  Orders some records to try it out and the speed it off.  Really disappointed.  Too late to return it.

CommentsTitle: Simple, easy to use. Dont get hopes up on quality of sound
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 8, 2020
CommentsContent: Bought this for my son who decided he might like to get into vinyl. So I got him this simple record player with Bluetooth. Remember this is a simple player. Sound quality a little tinny. This is not a stereo phonic player so it is great  for what it is. Perfect price for someonestarting out.  Hint: if the needle slides over the surface of a record but does Not play. Tape a nickel on the head. It adds enough weight to the arm to play but does not drag.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 25, 2021
CommentsContent: I was really disappointed with it. It was super cute, but when it came time to actually play my records, the sound was super distorted. I tried 4 different records and each one sounded weird. I didn’t have high expectations considering the price, but I at least wanted to hear the music the way it was supposed to be.

CommentsTitle: This is a toy player, lots of wobble in playback = skipping records
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 19, 2018
CommentsContent: Received one as a gift and the player wobbled during playback. Thought it was just damaged in shipping so we tried again, the second unit was better but still has a lot of wobble. Caused skipping on brand new records.As a cute toy player sure, but that's all I can say. Save your money and get something else.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 15, 2021
CommentsContent: This is a really nice, good beginner record player. Great packaging and everything works well, the speakers are a little bit tinny, but they still have a nice loud sound. I love how when you put the needle over the record, it automatically spins, neat feature. Comes with an extra needle, always helpful, and the Bluetooth feature works amazing and fast.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 5, 2018
CommentsContent: It will not power on. Not sure if the power cord is defective or the record player itself but no power right out of the box.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2020
CommentsContent: This was a Christmas grift and it has been well used for the last two months. The sound quality is awesome. I was a little nervous after reading some negative reviews, but it has worked wonderfully for us. It is used on a daily basis and we haven’t seen any issues with it. It was a great purchase, now we just need more records!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 23, 2019
CommentsContent: For an entry level turntable, this one is just peachy. I use mine semi-regularly, and haven't encountered any problems with the needle or the motor or anything. If you aren't super serious about sound quality, then you most likely won't mind the sound quality. It's, well, it's just ok.The added functionality of the bluetooth and auxiliary capabilities are definitely an added bonus. It's an easy to use, low maintenance player that also adds to the look of any room.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 16, 2021
CommentsContent: Won't play well on any portion of the record that hangs over the edge of the table. The whole side with the arm pushes down a good 1/2" easily with the slightest pressure. Horrible quality. The Bluetooth is the only part that actually works well.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 27, 2020
CommentsContent: This is AWESOME! I bought to play some old records that were recently returned to me (after 30+ years) and wow! I am impressed! This is 100x better than the record player I had as a kid! The sound is great, too! My kids couldn't believe I used to spend hours and hours listening to and changing records. Would recommend to anyone who loves records.

CommentsTitle: OK sound , better has a guide pin for start track.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 13, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   Sounds is OK.good for starter.  The head better had a guide pin for slide into start track.

CommentsTitle: Might be good if you get one that works
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 26, 2020
CommentsContent: The first one I received didn’t work—never turned on, no light, no sound. The replacement I received didn’t have a power chord, and then when I got one, it didn’t work either. I’ve made two trips to UPS to drop off defective record players and I still have no way to listen to my vinyl.

CommentsTitle: Great item for the record enthusiast!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 31, 2018
CommentsContent: This is the perfect starter system for someone interested in playing their record collection!I purchased this for my 12 year old son who’s obsessed with all things vintage. It was super easy to teach him how to use it and required little set-up. He loves the portable, sleek design as well as the fact he can use an additional speaker for more sound since the system is not loud enough in his opinion. The easy open and close suitcase design is the cherry on top.We would definitely purchase again!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 8, 2020
CommentsContent: Nice product, daughter absolutely loved it! Sound quality is good, convenience of Bluetooth capacity and would highly recommend

CommentsTitle: Makes brand new records appear warped
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 18, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   As seen in video - this record player makes all the records appear warped while playing. The turn table is very uneven, so much that the arm is actually moving up and down a ton while playing. I’ve tried it on about 10 brand new records (out of the packaging) and they all do this. The records themselves are not warped at all. It looks terrible and I worry about it actually warping my records. Very disappointed. No evident damage in shipping - it was packaged well. Just poor quality..maybe I got a bad egg? Now it’s too late to return it though amazon because I’ve been trying to fix the problem myself and cannot

CommentsTitle: All you need, nothing you don't.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 16, 2021
CommentsContent: This neat little turntable has everything you need (except a spare needle) and nothing you don't. The stock speakers sound surprisingly good. Bought it as an x-mas present and have used it probably 100 hrs since then with no problems. Would recommend.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 12, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this for my 7 year old so I'm not that picky. I wanted something portable, purple with good sound. So far that's been met, however the turntable makes a scraping sound with every revolution. It doesn't sound like it's hurting anything, like it's coming from underneath, not from the record. I don't think my kid would notice with the music playing and I don't want to go through the trouble of returning. But still, for $60 it shouldn't have a strange noise.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 10, 2020
CommentsContent: The record player doesn't include a DAC worth its weight, so it's practically useless if you're going to hook it into external speakers. I returned the product and purchased an audio technica model instead, which is significantly better. The only use case I can see for this is if you really need a portable player.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 14, 2020
CommentsContent: It's great. My boyfriend loves it. We've been using it for over a year now and it still works amazing. We just got speakers to make it even better.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2020
CommentsContent: This is my first record player, so I don't know what the usual sound quality is, but it seems to be good. I haven't used the bluetooth yet, because I already have a speaker. I love this and can't wait to get more records, as of right now I have two records and the Beatles album plays beautifully. This was a Christmas gift from my mom. I have heard these scratch your records but since I'm a beginner I don't want to spend to much money for a record player. I will eventually get a better one though!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 5, 2019
CommentsContent: What a bargain!  I bought this for myself ( an adult ), just to have something to play some old records on.  No, the sound quality isn't "studio quality", but for the price you can't expect it to be.  To me, it reminds me very fondly of the days when I was younger, listening to my parents records on MY record player in my room.  Theirs was too fancy & expensive for a young person, ha ha.  The bluetooth is nice also.  Overall, super satisfied with it!

CommentsTitle: Works, but in can quality audio
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 27, 2017
CommentsContent: Lots of options for output, none of which are particularly high quality. Yes, some of that does have to do with the vinyl, but the sound coming from any of the speaker options is tin can like. I'll experiment with some other options to improve the range adjustments and so forth, but let's just say it's not going to sound like your old sound system from the 70's.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 3, 2019
CommentsContent: I'm only giving it a bad review because it's already broken. It won't turn on

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 6, 2019
CommentsContent: I really need to send this back. The needle does not stay on the record. It is not weighted properly. It's in a cute case and the concept of transporting it easily in its compact case is wonderful. However, it does not work. The turntable and needle may fall apart in the transport. Not a good choice unless you plan to keep it in one place. Not durable enough for a child under 12.

CommentsTitle: It's a good record player but for better sound hook up to bigger speakers
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 20, 2020
CommentsContent: For some reason it would not connect to my Bluetooth headset, the speakers are very small so the sound is not that great so I would recommend hooking up to a receiver using some RCA cables. But it is very easy to use and it does not take up a lot of space.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 30, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   It’s true that it looks a bit on the toy side but hey, it does what its promised to do. I love the color, sound is not bad at all, Bluetooth works and I can enjoy my dad’s  old vinyls and my new ones.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 27, 2019
CommentsContent: This record player works amazingly, especially for the price. But the most useful thing about it is the size in weight. When the package first arrived i doubted the fact that the package was correct because of how light it was. Then when opening it seems to be too small to hold a regular sized vinyl, but i was proven wrong in both aspects.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 8, 2021
CommentsContent: Bought this for my son because we all know that old is new and vinyl records are in. My son wanted a player for Xmas and I didn’t want this to be the new shiny toy he’d play with for 14min and never touch again. It was very affordable and I was very surprised of how good it played.

CommentsTitle: Bad sound Quality, makes your records skip
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 20, 2020
CommentsContent: I wish I would have dived into the reviews a little more before I purchased.  I was looking for something at a reasonable price to play my 80’s vinyl collection.  What a disappointment, almost all my records seem to skip to the point it makes the music just not notable to listen to and the sound itself yikes!!! No bass built in at all, sounds like your listening to AM radio.  Very bad sound quality.  Wish I hadn’t purchased it but I’m too lazy to take time and box up to return for $50.

CommentsTitle: Cool compact record player but defective.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 27, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   This is a very cool record player and the stereo sound is better than expected however the product is defective. ☹️  I tried 3 different 45 records and it is warped or stops playing during the last 15 seconds of the song.  See video.  Will update review once it’s replaced.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 9, 2019
CommentsContent: This is my first record player. I don't know the technical stuff associated with record players yet, so I went for cute and cheap with the pink turntable. The sound quality isn't very good, but I love that you can hook up external speakers to it. The unit is actually very light and I'm pretty careful when moving it around. For the cost, I am happy with it although it will not serve as a long term record player I think.

CommentsTitle: I loved all the features this record player had to offer
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 5, 2018
CommentsContent: I was very excited about this purchase. It was a gift for my daughter. She has long needed one. I loved all the features this record player had to offer.It was a hit but unfortunately it was lacking it's power cord. The refund process went smoothly. I will be reordering same one and hopefully can give a better review

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 24, 2020
CommentsContent: i was so excited to receive my first record player, and felt i couldn’t go wrong with a name like victrola after using my grandfather’s antique one.i immediately unboxed and set up my favorite vinyl. the second the sound came through, i was incredibly disappointed - the sound quality was absolutely abhorrent! i’ve had cheap jelly headphones with better sound quality than this speaker, which is saying a lot. I’ve already boxed itup and will return it after the holidays. very, very disappointed in the quality of this record player, and do not advise anyone purchase this.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 14, 2019
CommentsContent: I love this record player, it's very stylish and portable, and also easy to plug in and get set up. The sound quality for records is excellent; for Bluetooth it is less so, but that doesn't matter to me a lot as I wasn't planning on using it as a speaker. Setup was so easy it almost didn't require a manual, but it comes with one, and both the box and case for the player were undamaged and clean. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a reliable, cute, and crisp- sounding player at a relatively low cost.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2021
CommentsContent: This packaging is terrible. This item was supposed to be brand new.  Not refurbished or used. And it was supposed to be a gift for someone.  How can I gift something that looks like this? Sounds quality is okay. Easy to assembly. I do like the overall aesthetic of it.Update: Hasn't been a month and it stopped working. It will not turn on and stopped playing music mid song.

CommentsTitle: ... really bought this as decor and to play the fun records I have on vinyl every now and then
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 22, 2017
CommentsContent: I'll be honest-- I really bought this as decor and to play the fun records I have on vinyl every now and then, but I have been pleasantly surprised by how much our family has enjoyed this record player! The volume goes much higher than I anticipated it to reach, but when really loud the sound is not the most clear. However, for what I paid for it I am thrilled with the purchase. If you are looking for something to look cool in your living room and play some fun records or even use the bluetooth feature, this is the record player for you!

CommentsTitle: VICTROLA VINYL - don't hesitate - buy it today!!!! CLASSIC
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 16, 2018
CommentsContent: Excellent Victrola.  Reminiscent of my teen age years and vinyl.  Make sure it is the original from Victrola (with clasp hook on case and white markings on knobs inside)  Had to have my second purchase (got it as a gift for my son) sent back and replaced from an authorized amazon dealer.  Check against the photo.  It is a WONDERFUL VINTAGE LIKE PRODUCT and works beautifully.....a conversation starter and excellent tech tool!

CommentsTitle: You get what ya pay for
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 20, 2017
CommentsContent: I wanted to like this. When it worked it sounded ok and I probably would have even kept it even though the speakers were just subpar. However, the 1st one I received had a broken arm. Sent back. Got a new one. Worked for a day before speakers stopped working. Done lol.On a positive- Amazon's returns process is great.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 7, 2020
CommentsContent: I was so fascinated to have one Vinyl record player for my bar and I checked this with this device. this is very quality and portable Vinyl player.the sound quality in this device is NOT so great but you can attach bluetooth speaker and play them on it.overall this is a good product to have.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 27, 2020
CommentsContent: This thing is awesome. Such a great little record player. Works and sounds great. Absolutely love it. Easy to figure out and use. Great bluetooth features. Sound quality is so clear. Highly recommended. Bought one for my daughter's boyfriend and had my sister buy one for my niece.

CommentsTitle: Dont buy this it is a piece of junk
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2020
CommentsContent: It says bluetooth but what they dont tell you and trick you on is that it connects bluetooth with your device to play thru the cheap crummy speakers on the turntable.  It is made very poorly and very cheap.  I called the support line because the bluetooth wasnt working and that is when i found out that your bluetooth device can play thru the turn table speakers.  I had to leave a message and then got a call back and while i was talking to him he hung up on me when i said that he misled me.  I called again and left another message for them to call back to no avail.  DONT BUT THIS ITEM>  it is a rip off

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 31, 2020
CommentsContent: Love everything about this record player, sound is great, can listen to albums I haven't heard in years and can use bluetooth also! Great deal for the money, ended up buying another for my granddaughter who was fascinated with mine!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2021
CommentsContent: I bought this for my 12 year old granddaughter.  She loves it.  Her mom and dad are already complaining how she plays it nonstop.  I love it because she is not glued to headphones.  Nice to see old things coming back into style.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 5, 2019
CommentsContent: I don't usually write reviews, but this product was really disappointing. The sound quality of the built in speakers was not terrible, but there was a huge issue with playing my new records. It would consistently skip parts of every song. Not even a few times. Full songs wouldn't be playable because it would keep skipping around. I have 6 vinyls (just started collecting) and 5 out of the 6 were not playable on this because of the skipping

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 16, 2020
CommentsContent: Bluetooth mode won't allow record to spin.  It will only work in phono mode.  This is especially disappointing because the built-in speaker is lackluster at best, and it was for use as a Bluetooth speaker.  It fails as a product.  I have tried everything and it just fails as a product.

CommentsTitle: The whole thing is a mess.  Some I didn't select or order
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 8, 2020
CommentsContent: This entire experience is a nightmare.  I have boxes ( some large) that I didn't even order.I can't open any thing because I don't want to be responsible for paying for it.  Get these boxesout of my house!  I should not have to be responsible for returning them to Kohl's. One isvery large.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 5, 2020
CommentsContent: I found the turntable/record player to be all that I needed.  I own a few vinyl records that I had not heard in a long while, this was an affordable and positive way to enjoy those sounds again.  Is it professional ?  No, but the value is perfect

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 12, 2019
CommentsContent: I purchased this as a Sweet 16 gift and the original and replacement skipped on several records. I tried the records on my record player and fine, but on both record players we tried unfortunately both turned out to be a disappointment as a gift giver and gift recipient. Total bust!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 21, 2020
CommentsContent: I saw this on Ellen and I thought how cool, I bet it is way to expensive. I was so excited to find out there was a 40.00 version.  My Husband is the hardest person to surprise/please for Christmas. This made him so happy and it works fabulous.  He has a huge vinyl and digital music collection.  So it was the absolute perfect gift.

CommentsTitle: GREAT PRODUCT FOR A GREAT PRICE
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 8, 2018
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   I bought this as a gift and obviosuly was a little nervous because the price was very low but when it got here and my boyfriend started playing music on it I was shocked it sounded sooo good. He's had it for 3 months now and it works just great. We haven't played an actual vinyl disc yet so I'll try to update this review once we do... until then, the bluetooth is awesome and the "record player effect" gives it a nice touch. 100% recommended.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 12, 2021
CommentsContent: The Record player itself is great but, when it arrived it was missing the power cord. I got this as a gift for my husband and we are past the return date. I had to go buy a power cord for it which is disappointing as it was almost as expensive as the record player itself. I did request a new one through Amazon and it told me the product wasn't eligible. So don't understand what that is about.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 13, 2021
CommentsContent: Purchased this for 15 year old daughter for Christmas was very happy with it for beginners it's perfe t it's not the best on the market but unless your a album junky and know a lot about records and the players this is greatI even purchased a second one for our dining room for fun and grabbed a few albums soWe have been happy with it

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 5, 2018
CommentsContent: Very cute style.  My 18 year old absolutely loved it.  It looks cheap compared with the originals from back in the day, but that's life.  The speakers do not have a great sound, but it suits the purpose of an all-in-one unit.  Because the sound is thin, I wouldn't pay extra for the bluetooth version.  You'll want a better speaker for that.  There is a matching album storage case which is also nice.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 12, 2018
CommentsContent: bought as a gift and promptly returned. it was not good at all. the sound was even worse than I anticipated. the album also wobbled the entire time it spun. just not a good product.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2020
CommentsContent: This was the perfect gift for my 19yr old son, he was totally surprised and thanked me over and over again. I’ve seen him leave the house with this product on numerous occasions, so I’d say it travels well. Haven’t heard him complain one bit about how the record player operates. The sound is not exactly great, but it’s what you’d expect if you remember what records sound like back in the day; good news is that you can connect it to other speakers, so the quality of sound is enhanced.

CommentsTitle: Don't buy this for anyone you LOVE
