CommentsTitle: Don't believe the good reviews; this is a low quality product.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2020
CommentsContent: I've never purchased my own turntable & based my choice from the overwhelming good reviews. That was my mistake. The Victrola is a low quality product that will ruin your records. At first I thought the product was just defective but after I did some research I found it was cheap & poorly made. The price should have been a dead giveaway. I upgraded to audiotechnica & couldn't be happier

CommentsTitle: Would have been a good record player if it worked for more than 20 minutes
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 7, 2021
CommentsContent: I was so excited about this record player and wound up very disappointed. The color was really pretty and the sound quality was pretty good. However, after about 20 minutes it turned off and wouldn't turn back on. I was in the middle of an album, and the power light went off and the record stopped spinning. I tried to turn in back on, plugged it in to different outlets, and tried everything I could think of. It still didn't work. I'm very disappointed. I returned it, and will be buying a record player from a different brand.

CommentsTitle: Do NOT waste your time and money on this player!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 4, 2020
CommentsContent: No matter what I tried, the needle was misaligned and skipped songs on all the records I had (that worked perfectly on all the other players I have). I got this for my wife, who had never owned a record player before and while it was easy to use/setup, she couldn't listen to any of the records we had because of this issue. I should have listened to the many reviews online and from colleagues that told me they also had this issue and its a common problem with the brand. While the sound quality was fine, it's ruined by the fact that it's unusable right out of the box.

CommentsTitle: It was a really great buy
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 5, 2021
CommentsContent: This product was purchased as a gift for my grandson, who had no idea how to use one.  We FaceTimed at Christmas when he opened his gift.  He was able to begin playing the LPs and connect his Bluetooth devices to it.  He loved it.

CommentsTitle: A great gift idea for dad!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 27, 2020
CommentsContent: Bought this for my dad as a Father's Day gift along with 2 records.HE LOVES IT!!Perfect crisp and clear!!Made my heart fill with joy to see him smiling and happy as good ol' Johnny Cash was spinning and playing...Bringing back fond memories for my dad I'm sure.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 16, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   Beautiful retro gift, love the case! Quality of sound and music is great....makes sound more nostalgic. Looked at various other record players on Amazon and happy with this selection.

CommentsTitle: You get what you pay for....
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 15, 2020
CommentsContent: This is a cute cheap turntable that looks great on your kid's room. The audio quality of the little speakers is terrible and the Bluetooth function is passable. If you want good quality tones invest a little more cash for a better unit.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 30, 2020
CommentsContent: It’s made of cheap plastic because of the crack cover and the the top record holder is not attached to the case. It must be a defective item!Also, there’s no power cord. Please check carefully before you deliver this product to customer.Waste my time and money.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 25, 2020
CommentsContent: Overall, this is a good record player with decent sound quality. My issue is with the care during shipping and delivery. The box came with a massive hash in the side and the record player mechanism was broken off the mount inside. It definitely did not live up to expectations.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 31, 2019
CommentsContent: Doesn't cost a fortune. You can move it around the house. Overall happy w product. I think it's for a kid, or someone who is not expecting alot from it. If you just want to play records, and not dj...this is for you.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 1, 2020
CommentsContent: Perfect starter record player. Doesn’t take up very much room. Even comes with an extra needle and tie die!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 19, 2021
CommentsContent: I was scared to spend this much money but im happy i did. There were cheaper ones but this brand looked trustworthy and im happy i got it. The sound quality is great and i really loved how good it was for begginers. I dont know anything about records but yet it was managable. It comes with instructions and a manual so that was great and it explains everything.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 30, 2020
CommentsContent: I absolutely love this record player! One problem was that (since I got the grey one) I couldn’t see the words beside the switches since it was all black. My sister got a blue one and the letters beside the switches on hers were white. So be in mind of that. It doesn’t cost a lot of trouble it’s just kind of bugging that I have to sort of look closely when trying to read the words.

CommentsTitle: Convenient and fun! Great for all ages.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 26, 2019
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   I got this as a gift for my 17 yr old daughter who has a love of vinyl music. I will say I am not disapointed in this purchase and she loves it so much. It is convenient . Sound is good, instructions are understandable for all ages. Plus Victrola is a trusted name to me.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 3, 2021
CommentsContent: Just want I wanted-- something compact to play records & also has the bluetooth capability which is awesome.  Volume control works great.  Very happy with purchase & already ordered another as gift for someone

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 28, 2019
CommentsContent: crap. Shakes, doesnt turn steady. The speed switch operates backwards. dont bother.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 29, 2020
CommentsContent: This is a great product for an inexpensive player and will provide hours of entertainment. It will produce plenty of volume for a large room.  I had to send my first one back after only about 6 hours of playtime, as the turntable would not stop turning, obviously as it should.  Other than that, we have enjoyed it very much.  I have yet to put as much time into the replacement to see if it will have the same issue.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 13, 2018
CommentsContent: My "USA Flag" turntable was delivered today and I have nothing but good things to say about it. First, it was packaged firmly and safely. And within 5 minutes of taking it out of the packaging, I was spinning my vinyl LP's. This turntable is so user friendly, and the speakers sound just fine. The bluetooth works perfectly and for the price being under $50, you cannot go wrong. I started collecting vinyl LP's again so I can re-live the memories of my younger years. And so far, Van Morrison, Bob Dylan, Elton John, and Creedence Clearwater Revival still sound AWESOME!👍🎵

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 30, 2020
CommentsContent: I got this for a 7 & 5 year old to listen to record books and they LOVED IT!!!!!  It was the biggest hit this year at Christmas.  Sturdy, easy to use, not so delicate that little hands got frustrated.  Excellent buy.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2021
CommentsContent: Really disappointing. It clicks when it plays. The deck bounces. We had to play our 33 on the 45 setting. It was clearly messed up. It’s cool looking and a great idea (suitcase style), but was a huge dud.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 24, 2020
CommentsContent: It was cute and it connected to my daughters phone and it was easy to move. But the sound was terrible so exchanged it. New one also had horrible sound. So sent it back.... that was in January... still waiting to get my money back. Very disappointed. Bought a different one at Walmart it worked great!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 23, 2018
CommentsContent: Great little player--especially for the price!  I love the ability to play any of my records, including 45s from the 40s and 50s inherited from my grandmother.  Sound quality is adequate for my non-connoisseur tastes and I like that I can use the built-in speakers or plug in headphones/earbuds.  I'm going to get another for my mom's birthday!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 12, 2019
CommentsContent: This phonograph is  a good deal for the price.  Nice for my daughter who has gotten interested in playing actual records.  My only complaint is that the item showed up on our front porch with no outer Amazon shipping box.  It was like someone purchasing the item in its box and putting it on our front porch.  First of all, the box was beat up and even open at the top.  Second, it was supposed to be a birthday surprise!  I cannot remember ever getting anything from Amazon in its original box and no other box to protect and conceal the item.  The phonograph seems to work all right, but I am disappointed in the shipping method.

CommentsTitle: Bad sounding speakers. Good for child gift.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 30, 2020
CommentsContent: Blue tooth only for incoming and speakers so bad you don't want to use this feature.Turntable wobbly.It looks cool and it is portable.Would be great for children.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 18, 2019
CommentsContent: Purchased this product in Dec 2018 as a Christmas gift. It would play some records and then not some. We assumed and returned several records, thinking it was records. Finally, we decided to check the last record we purchased by playing on another player. The record worked. This player is not worth purchasing - taking a risk to see if you will get a good one or a bad one. Now we are beyond the return April 18, 2019. That’s not very long for something to be bad!!! Very disappointed!!

CommentsTitle: Great Christmas gift for my grandfather
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 24, 2021
CommentsContent: his old record player stopped working so I got him this and it works great, everything is easy to use and its portable. the speakers are crap but you can hook up other speakers or use Bluetooth which is neat

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 13, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this product in September 2020, I travel for work and I love listening to my vinyls. I came back home December 2020. Plugged it in and the player no longer works. I tried switching outlets. I checked to see if the A/C was plugged in correctly a number of times. I guess I get what I paid for.

CommentsTitle: You get what you pay for maybe not even
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 12, 2019
CommentsContent: It spins a record but product is a get what you pay for maybe just got it the table and arm section have a lot of play in it the arm lever doesn't work properly it will lift the arm but when you put it down the part that lifted sticks and you have to use your finger to push it down or the arm will not touch the record thinking about going to store find a better one and return this one

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 7, 2019
CommentsContent: i got this for my mom for her birthday and i think she's used it twice (her birthday is march 10th). The bluetooth doesn't work as i came to realize yesterday and I can't return it because it's not mine so, MONEY WASTED. i don't care how cool these are, I'm not getting one for myself because vinyls are super expensive and i have spotify premium. If you still want one, don't buy this brand. it sucks.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 29, 2021
CommentsContent: It’s not very often I feel the need to write a bad review but I feel this deserves just that.  Got this for a gift, used handful of times and now 3 months later the record player won’t turn on. We have tried different power outlets and it’s the player. The base that the turn table sits on is cheap plastic and very loose. I wouldn’t be surprised if something is loose inside with the wires. Very disappointed  in this purchase. I didn’t want to give it one star but you have to choose one. Lol

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 14, 2020
CommentsContent: Bought this as a birthday gift and now I'm going to order me one. Plays at a nice level,  love the Bluetooth capability to it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 24, 2021
CommentsContent: Amazon is shady. Beware!! Nowhere did it say that this item was used, much less that it was damaged. No directions, no extra stylus, no 45 adapter. This item loaded without stating USED. And if Amazon describes their used items as "like new" this is an outright lie. Obviously nobody bothered to inspect this item. Now Bezos gets to make interest off of my money for the 3-5 days it will take them to refund my money for this piece of garbage

CommentsTitle: good sound, easy use, speed was a little off, good quality
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 14, 2021
CommentsContent: good sound, easy use, speed was a little off, good quality

CommentsTitle: Do not buy this product is junk
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 27, 2019
CommentsContent: Quality of the sound is horrible turntable wheel will not turn in less you started with your hand and then it turns regularly. Speeds up and slows down. This product is junk.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 7, 2021
CommentsContent: 16 yr old son loved this.  We couldn't figure out what to get him.  He loves music so we bought him this and some vinyl albums.  It's not a "stereo" quality and for what it is, we are very satisfied and so is he.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 24, 2018
CommentsContent: Very disappointed.  My daughter opened it up on Christmas Eve and we had got her some record albums in a 45 but the adapter was missing so she couldn’t plan a thing and we were all so bummed!  Omg seriously.  You get what you pay for. Now I have to contact the company and try to get the damn adapter .

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2020
CommentsContent: Very disappointed.  This was a gift I purchased for someone 2.5 months ago.  As the title states, it worked twice.  Since then, every record skips, and nothing seems to fix it.  We're going to contact Victrola for trouble-shooting help.  I'll update this review on the outcome.  Sadly, not recommended.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 10, 2019
CommentsContent: I wasn't expecting much at this price point.  The turntable works nicely but the speakers are terrible.  My phone's built-in speakers are better than these things.  External speakers are going to be a necessity..UPDATE:  External speakers are not much better. Louder yes, but still sounds bad. Don’t bother wasting your money. Spend a little more for a better player. Dropping a star from 3 to 2.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 14, 2020
CommentsContent: Makes for a cute decoration but unless you’re just spinning some old dinky records you got at a yard sale for five dollars you need to invest in a better player. This model has no counterweight, no antiskate and a very small platter (since it hangs off the side the disk will end up bending as it’s spun) so your records WILL be damaged- this is a guarantee. If that isn’t enough because there isn’t a counterweight the sound will be warbled and skipping. Audio-Technica has a good one for a hundred bucks, just use theirs.

CommentsTitle: Simple and Attractive Way to get LP Play
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 5, 2018
CommentsContent: My son said he wanted a turntable.  I wanted something that wasn't a huge investment, while he figures out if he is really going to be in to vinyl.  This is a really good looking turntable.  Plays great.  Seems very durable.  Super easy for him to pack it up and take to a friend's house.  The speakers are not great, but they are serviceable, and there is a jack, if you want to buy speakers to improve the quality.  I have not tried the bluetooth, so I don't know about that.

CommentsTitle: Plastic housing arrived loose from box. drive was off ...
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2018
CommentsContent: Plastic housing arrived loose from box.  drive was off and sound quality was not up to expectation.  I returned and opted for a component to attach to my receiver in lieu.  Go the extra step unless this is a gift for a 10 year old or younger.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 20, 2019
CommentsContent: My dad and I used to jump on the couches downstairs listening to vinyls, so they have a special place in our hearts. His player broke long ago, so I got him this, and he is just in love :) The speaker is pretty good, and my ONLY complaint is that we can't like take it in the car because it needs to be plugged in. I love it and would buy it again!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2020
CommentsContent: This turntable skips a lot especially on newer vinyl.  The tone arm doesn’t seem well.  The tone arms skips more and more as the record plays on and it moves toward the center.  I’ll be returning mine and getting a higher quality player.

CommentsTitle: However record player works good and looks nice
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 7, 2018
CommentsContent: Record player was a gift and was not shipped in a box to  protect it at all ... it was shipped in the box you would buy at the store with a label slapped on it . Someone could have seen what it was, and it should have been protected more, However record player works good and looks nice.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 26, 2021
CommentsContent: We play lots of music and wanted a record played that was still small enough to not take up too much space since we also use CDs and radio a great deal. This small speaker is doing the trick.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 14, 2020
CommentsContent: Sadly sound is horrible and the player just skips on most vinyl records . Bluetooth is badly designed, you cannot send the signal to a Bluetooth speaker as it only takes incoming signals so you are stuck with the awful sound from the built in speakers,

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 12, 2017
CommentsContent: Item came with the screws that hold turn table in place rattling around inside. Put them in ourselves, but table is cheap and wobbles the sound. Not a good purchase. Gave as a gift, by the time we realized I had no return options. :(

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 22, 2021
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   Love it !!! Just what I wanted!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 15, 2020
CommentsContent: Ordered one for my daughter for Christmas; however when we put a record on it, the record wobbled and skipped (no matter how many records we tired)so she couldn't use it.  We exchanged on Amazon for a replacement and the replacement was worse...the turn table made a grinding noise and would come to a complete stop any time the needle touched the record on it.I am done with this brand and will be shopping for a different record player without these issues.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 14, 2018
CommentsContent: Great record player! Great price! It has inspired me to collect more vinyls! Good sound, and can be loud! Very stylish, as well! The material it is made of seems to be quality.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 24, 2020
CommentsContent: I am really enjoying this little record player. Records play well.  The sound quality is heavy on the treble with no knob to balance treble and/or base, but for an "I haven't played my albums in years" experience, it is fun.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 16, 2020
CommentsContent: I absolutely love this turntable. I couldn’t be happier. It’s original looking, sleek, and even portable! Love that it folds up to look like a suitcase. It’s protected and sturdy, not super lightweight and cheap. No issues and have listened to a variety of records on it.

CommentsTitle: Garbage, Broken, Go digital, this idea to go backwards in tech has never seemed more redundant
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 24, 2019
CommentsContent: This is a waste of time, go digital with your books and movies and music. I can't believe how much money my girlfriend and I have wasted on two different quick to break garbage record players. Stop buying vinyl like it is cool people. Digital if you actually care about anything. Like if it produces zero waste and takes up only memory space on electronic devices... why are we wasting our time on ancient outdated obsolete obtuse grandpa tech? Let the bad ideas die people.

CommentsTitle: Fun to play with at friend or family gatherings..
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 3, 2019
CommentsContent: Love it. Not as much volume as I'd like and can't pair to sound bars or other volume enhancing tech. But cute as heck in the U.S. flag case and having a lot of fun spinning vinyl as a pretty cool attention getter during party fun. Guests love picking and spinning our old classic vinyls. Score.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 10, 2018
CommentsContent: Love this record player. I’ve been listening to dozens of records over the past week or so. I read some reviews about people being disappointed in it, but mine works perfectly, it is super easy to use, and the sound quality is impressive considering the size of it. It’s the right size not to take up too much space and I can take it with me to a friends house easily if I wanted to.The records play really well. Just use it correctly and be careful with the needle and not scratching your records. If your records are scratched, then obviously it will sound scratchy when you play them.Definitely recommend it! Especially because they come in a variety of color options for the case!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 26, 2020
CommentsContent: My turn table skips so much it’s frustrating. I got it two days ago and I’ve only used it twice. I read that the record could be dusty but it’s a brand new record with no dust. Was hesitant to buy because of the bad reviews

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 3, 2021
CommentsContent: Purchased for a gift.  The case and turntable are nice and usable, but the sound is something to be desired.  Overall an average rating at best.

CommentsTitle: SKIPS ON EVERYTHING - Old or New
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   Just received my replacement. I was hoping the first one was an anomaly but sadly no.  I bough 4 new LPs and had some vintage. Every single one skips on the first track.  Customer service was great and quickly got me a replacement but it did the same thing. Every record skips including the 4 I took straight out of the package. Will be asking for a refund.  *sigh*

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 6, 2020
CommentsContent: The machine is cheap for a reason. The speakers sound terrible throughout the sound range and have nonexistent bass. The needle skips on most of the records used causing it to be unusable mostly. The build quality is cheap but expected from a viynl player at this range. The device looks pretty but I would highly recommend looking into other devices.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2021
CommentsContent: Everything was fine with this for a year and 2 months. Went to use it and it caught fire. Warranty is only 1 year. I'd find a different one. We won't be buying another one from this brand.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 8, 2021
CommentsContent: Purchased black version of this for myself. Purchased red version as gift. Very good quality for price. Sound and playability is very good with blue tooth streaming ability of music. Nice retro item.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 22, 2020
CommentsContent: Super neat. First I have ever bought and I love it. When you don't have a big vinyl collection the blue tooth helps out with that. All in all this is a good first-timer buy and it packs up and stores super easy.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 25, 2018
CommentsContent: I bought this for my son for Christmas thinking it would be a good starter record player. I didn’t have any expectations of it producing great sound since it is a cheap record player. We put a record on at half volume and part way into the first song the sound stopped coming from the speaker. I own a couple of other nice quality turntables and figured I could troubleshoot it but it is clearly overall defective. Larger records are also very wobbly as the platter is very small.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 25, 2019
CommentsContent: We used it 3 times and it broke. When customer service was connected - they are not helpful. I don’t want a refund. I just want a record player that works!  They identified issue. But don’t inform you how to fix it!

CommentsTitle: Spend your money on something worthwhile
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 7, 2019
CommentsContent: Not a good product. Very cheaply made. Doesn’t even play the records right. It is so cheaply made it doesn’t even rotate the records and play them properly. Returned.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 19, 2017
CommentsContent: I bought this two months ago - I needed to replace the needle and when I did the sound wasn’t right. I thought it might just be the replacement needle so I tried a different one. The problem persisted. The music plays but it’s very muffled and it’s not smooth. I’m not sure what the problem is. I’ve tried different albums. Very frustrating because I just bought 10 new vinyl albums and will now have to buy a new (but better) record player for them. Waste of $50. Invest in a better product. It worked great for two months...I’m glad I waited to write a review.

CommentsTitle: This was a gift to someone
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 7, 2021
CommentsContent: This was on someone's Christmas wish list & it was very well received & appreciated. She's interested in vinyl recordings (better sound quality & more info on the album covers than on little cd's.)

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 21, 2019
CommentsContent: I bought this as a gift for my father.  He commented on how many records he had and how there was nothing to play them on.  He was excited enough when I brought it over and set it up.  It sounded ok.  Well, probably good considering.  It should last for many years because after I left him with it, he never touched it again.  The only time it gets touched now is when it is dusted.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 3, 2017
CommentsContent: Great little turntable!  Some of my favorite vinyl is in 78 format and the fact that the Victoria had this speed setting was a big driver for me.  I also really like that it's a self contained, easily transportable unit.  The integrated Bluetooth was a nice, modern technology touch to this retro device.  The price point is excellent too.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 12, 2020
CommentsContent: This is not a good record player. No matter what record you get this turntable will not play it correctly because the actually turntable that turns and plays the vinyl is smaller than the vinyl causing it to wobble. And since vinyls have grooves in order to play the music the vinyl will just skip or have a warp sound to it. I do not recommend buying this unit.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 31, 2020
CommentsContent: I didn't expect the best sound quality out of this product based on the price, but I thought the bluetooth and AUX options would allow me to play the albums through another speaker. That isn't the case so there isn't a way to expand the sound of albums leaving me with these two sad speakers. :-( On a good note, it looks really cute sitting on our bar and gives me a feeling of nostalgia.

CommentsTitle: Didn't even work out of the package
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 11, 2020
CommentsContent: Wouldn't turn. Didn't even get a chance to see how it sounded broken right out of the box. Either a factory default or the delivery person dropped it. Absolutely ruined my birthday so thanks for that.

CommentsTitle: Stops working after a couple uses
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 14, 2021
CommentsContent: I got this as a birthday present for a friend of mine and she used it once and then it crapped out and stopped working. Not happy at all, especially since I couldn’t return it. Not a good quality product, please look elsewhere. Felt so guilty that her present didn’t work after a use

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 8, 2020
CommentsContent: Victrola Vintage 3-Speed Bluetooth Suitcase Turntable was a very nice gift. Works very well. Arrived on time for the party. Unfortunately, the outside of the package was destroyed and re-taped with a large quantity of packing tape, there was no outside wrapper to protect the product box.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 26, 2019
CommentsContent: I have boughten two of these turntables. One from Fry's and it was broken out of the box. Unforunately, this one also came broken.This manufacturer seems to be unreliable and I would not recommend this item.The worse part was I bought this for my mom.. And now I'm stuck with two pieces of junk that don't work.The funny part is I think it ran once before no longer working. I was told that the sound quality was also not great when it did work.All and all do not buy this product.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 14, 2021
CommentsContent: It’s super cute, but the sound is really bad. I hardly use it because I can get better sound straight from my phone or computer. I just resort to my old player If I want to listen to albums.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 28, 2021
CommentsContent: I've got a crank Victorolla from 1917 and wanted to get a more modern one. I love this little thing. Its clear and the volume is decent. Side note: if you're having problems with it skipping tape a penny on the needle head. It will weigh it down enough to keep it from happening again.

CommentsTitle: Sound Quality is a bit weak without your own speaker set up
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 18, 2019
CommentsContent: First off, I love this record player. I purchased the bright red color and it looks awesome.That being said, the sound quality of this record player without any kind of external speaker set up is just okay.I think it's fine for a record like The Times They Are A-Changin' by Bob Dylan, but for rock and roll records, in which bass is essential, the bass is barely audible. I would advise anyone who wishes to purchase this record player to also purchase an external sound system that you can connect to this record player to give your records more volume and power. Other than that it is a great buy and I have had no problems with it whatsoever (since I do have an external speaker system).

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 8, 2019
CommentsContent: Bought the record player and has already stopped working in less then 6 months. Plugged it in and immediately started to smell a burning smell. Only used 8 times. Waste of money.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 30, 2020
CommentsContent: This is the single most worst purchase that I have ever made from Amazon! It is not the unit that I purchased and the power cord that was shipped with it doesn’t belong to it. Cannot even begin to describe how upsetting this is. Can’t send it back fast enough. Horrible, horrible, horrible!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2021
CommentsContent: Bought this for Christmas for my son. He tried three records on it and thought they were all warped only to learn it was the quality of Record player it was not a good gift snd we were very disappointed!

CommentsTitle: Power supply exploded on first plug in!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 18, 2018
CommentsContent: I'd love to say this was a great product, but the moment my daughter plugged it in the power adapter exploded in her hand. She was not injured, but it scared her and she burst into tears. Luckily we were home and it didn't burn the house down. This is a dangerous product. Warranty info in the manual states that I have to send the manufacturer $ for a warranty repair. I will be returning this product.

CommentsTitle: Delicate Needle mechanism but amazing sound quality
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 16, 2020
CommentsContent: This either came broken or a piece was missing. The needle is extremely delicate and has to sit just right on the hinge otherwise it slips off and can’t play. When you set it up just right it plays magnificently though and the sound quality is amazing! Still recommend it

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 14, 2020
CommentsContent: Got this for my boyfriend for Christmas and I dunno I think it’s really cool. Totally works as soon as you bust it out, sounds great. I’m excited to keep using it.I couldn’t figure out the bluetooth but I really think that’s a me problem.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 5, 2020
CommentsContent: Got this as a gift for someone this Christmas, until I could afford the one they really wanted. I was super nervous as they are super into tech and music and nice things and have expensive taste. They loved it! They immediately called me to show me how much they loved it and they loved the sound quality. Such a great idea!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 22, 2020
CommentsContent: Oh my goodness! I love this record player! It’s a great throw back to my childhood! Playing Christmas albums with the little crackle sounds is so comforting and memorable! Such a treat to teach my 18 year old all about it too!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 21, 2021
CommentsContent: I thought the boy was gonna cry. He loves old records. The was a great purchase for him. Sounds great. Just like I remember them to be.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 23, 2020
CommentsContent: This is amazing! I got it as my graduation gift and have used it almost every day since!The sound is amazing and it works great both with Vinyl's and as a speaker when connected to Bluetooth.The color is very cute and I also love the aesthetic of it when not in use <3

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 22, 2020
CommentsContent: I should have read the description better.  Why Victrola would make a record player with only line in Bluetooth capability is beyond me.  You will most certainly not want to listen to your vintage records thru the sub-par speakers that are on this portable player.  If connected to better speakers it would be a hit! This goes back immediately.  DO NOT BUY IF YOU WANT TO OUTPUT TO BLUETOOTH SPEAKERS!!!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 9, 2020
CommentsContent: We have loved listening to our old albums with the kids. Building a new collection with our kids from antique stores is so much fun! Finding albums from our era and our parents era is so exciting, plus we get to find new gems of years gone by. And they still use it when we're not around to listen to "their" music. Hearing music from their rooms is priceless. Brings back our memories of being young. Sound is comparable to what we heard years ago but clearer. Doesnt get too loud. Can hear the "scratch" so if you like that u will love this player.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 20, 2020
CommentsContent: Bought this Victrola for my son as a Christmas gift as he and friends have been interested in acquiring & listening to the sound of vinyl records. He is very pleased with the design and portability of this player. Also, he was surprised that the speakers carried so much volume.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 25, 2017
CommentsContent: Plays all my records, the only thing I have a problem with is that I thought the Bluetooth would broadcast the record being played on it, instead the record player works like a Bluetooth speaker for something like a phone playing music. I would say it's built in sound quality isn't great, but it gets the job done.

CommentsTitle: Poor quality, didn’t last for long.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 11, 2018
CommentsContent: I got this for my husband for Christmas this year. I knew it wasn’t top quality as it was only $40, but I figured that it would work well enough for him to experiment with a record player and decide if he wanted to invest in a more expensive product down the road. It is only barely over 3 months later and despite excellent care on his part, the sound has become incredibly wobbly and the quality is so distorted it isn’t even worth using. Very disappointed and would return this product if I could.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 9, 2018
CommentsContent: I've had this record player for over a year. In the beginning i had no issues with skipping as they were older records. I've ordered some brand new Vinyl recently and all of the new records skip. There's no anti skating on this record player. As soon as the music picks up it will skip. Not worth the money because the standard fixes (a penny or a quarter) did not fix this.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 17, 2019
CommentsContent: Sound is horrible, and on the one I received, the speed was off (too slow).  Returned for refund.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 30, 2020
CommentsContent: My 11 year old granddaughter is a music lover. She wanted to experience “vinyl” and this was a great way for her to do it. She especially loved the denim fabric look.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 29, 2019
CommentsContent: Received a broken product today. It didn't come in a shipping box it was simply the product box that the table came in.  The lift lever is completely broken and the turntable looks like its suppose to be glued down but it lifts completely up..trash will be sending back

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 26, 2019
CommentsContent: Item stopped working after a 1 1/2 years.  Not Bluetooth.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 1, 2021
CommentsContent: Veri nice finish. The on board sound is OK. The sound in the head phones are OK too but the rca sound is terrible. So if you are planning to send the audio to a external amplifier, look for something else.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 23, 2020
CommentsContent: This product is wonderful. I bought the used-like new and it arrived a day earlier than expected. The record player truly is like new. It didn't have any marks, still had some of the plastic on it, and works wonderfully. I'm sure the used-good condition are just as great. I appreciate the solid packaging and speedy delivery. Thank you!!This record player is more for beginners and its looks which is why I got it. I am not an expert. If you have a serious collection I'm sure a more $$$ one will be better for you:) But if you simply enjoy listening to records for fun, this is perfect.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2018
CommentsContent: My 14 year old granddaughter wanted thisVictrola for Christmas and I was not sure we would get it by Christmas. We got it in plenty of time and she loves it. Her and my daughter play all my mothers old records. What a great gift !!!

CommentsTitle: Bought this for it's bluetooth connectivity
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2021
CommentsContent: Will not work with my bluetooth speaker alone.  Haven't figured out a way to go through my computer first and then to my speaker.  But it's loud enough that it's not really an issue in my apartment.  It's a great turntable and sounds good, but I wish the bluetooth interface was simple and universal.

CommentsTitle: Good Idea, but play back is poor!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 3, 2020
CommentsContent: my daughter received this for Christmas, and several records would skip and repeat... we returned the records and the replacements did the same, we replaced the record player with a much nicer model and the records play perfectly! beware this is more of a novelty then practical.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 3, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   I absolutely love this little record player! Cute as can be. Sound isn't great but I wanted it to sound more like what I heard from my record player in the 1970s as a kid. This does that perfectly and brings back great memories.

CommentsTitle: Unknown to us, the product was out of stock.  Amazon sent refurbished item WITHOUT a power cord.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 12, 2021
CommentsContent: Bought by one-click, order never showed a refurbished item!  No power cord and no speaker cables means we can't tell if/how well it works.  Manufacturer was of no help - wouldn't take a phone inquiry, referred to website and never responded.  Will not buy another of these because of that alone.  Amazon pulled a fast one...be cautious using one-click.  We didn't see that AMAZON provided a refurbished product at their option, not ours!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 25, 2019
CommentsContent: Didn’t work. The record didn’t spin. Don’t order this

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 22, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this to play some of my modern records. I brought to my parents and my dad played some of his old records. It brought back memories for him and he was amazed how clear the sound was! So worth it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 29, 2020
CommentsContent: Very disappointed. My daughter used her own money to buy this - was very anxious to get it and when it arrived the locking mechanism is broken! It looks like it will be fun to use, and love the color, but very disappointed in the quality control.  Chances are she will set it somewhere in her room and not move it, but if she wanted to take it to a friends as an example, she can't lock it up to carry it. The speakers are ok but sound quality is tinny, not enough base.

CommentsTitle: Good function and style, mediocre craftsmanship.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 3, 2020
CommentsContent: Functions exactly as you would expect a small portable turntable in this price range to function. Bluetooth is cool and the ability to hook it up to better quality speakers makes it very versatile. Love the color and feel of this style. Unfortunately I found a few bubbles in the vinyl coating of mine, which I'm a little disappointed by. Not bad enough to return it, but I'm a bit picky so I'll probably end up trying to fix it myself, which is frustrating to have to do on a brand new item.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 12, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this record player for my nephew as a birthday gift. He was so excited to get it. He opened it and i helped him set it up and it only worked that first day. The next day there were several problems with it. I called the company and they said it sounded like a power cord issue but they couldn't send a new power cord because the warehouse was closed due to the pandemic. So I went to Micro Center to get a new power cord and It didn't fix the problem. Poorly designed product. I do not recommend it. Go with a different company.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 5, 2020
CommentsContent: Really love the color, sound is great, not staticky or anything, (obviously not like a super professional sound system, but very good quality), doesn't feel cheap, pretty sturdy. The only thing is my roommate always leaves their bluetooth on, so it automatically connects to her phone instead of mine, which makes it kind of annoying to fiddle around with. Other than that, connection is a breeze. The record player has 3 different speeds for different records and plays very smoothly. I wouldn't really take it anywhere, although I suppose you could because it does securely latch and has a sturdy case and handle.

CommentsTitle: Easy to set up. Great record player.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 10, 2021
CommentsContent: My 17 year old wanted a record player. This was perfect sized and at the right price. It’s easy for her to use and she’s working on expanding her record collection.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 30, 2020
CommentsContent: I was thinking in-line ment i could connect my speakers too it to make it lounder...but that was not it. it ment you can connect to listen from other machine through speakers in the box

CommentsTitle: Weigh down needle to fix skips
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 28, 2021
CommentsContent: The first record I tried skipped a bit. To fix it, I just tape a dime and a penny to the top of the needle bit, and now it play perfectly. Annoying that it didn't work perfect on its own, but an 11 cent fix isn't too bad!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 25, 2020
CommentsContent: Arrived broken.  Pieces were sitting in bottom and apart. Black piece broken off and sitting on bottom.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 2, 2020
CommentsContent: Bought as a gift for my 11 yo daughter. She loves it. I have owned a few older record players and didnt think this one would be as nice as it was. The mechanics seemed decent and the speakers are clear and provide good sound. I did not try the BT feature, just played a Carpenters album.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 16, 2020
CommentsContent: Really wanted to like this product, especially for the price. I know it's not the most well made record player. But the sound was fine. All of the sudden it just stopped working. I've contacted Amazon a few times and the manufacturer. Haven't gotten a possible response yet, just a simply "I'm sorry." I would recommend spending a bit more money to get something nicer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2020
CommentsContent: Great little record player. I bought this for my son to try records for the first time. It was so good I bought another one for my mom! Super easy and portable. Definitely recommended!

CommentsTitle: poor packaging, missing parts, poor sound quality
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 8, 2019
CommentsContent: cute product, sound quality it awful.tiny sound.  similar to your phone or built-in laptop speakerspackaging was badly damagesalso (this happens too often with amazon products) i received an item that had clearly been used before.  it was either a return or display.  all of the plastic seals had been previously opened and reclosedalso was missing the av cable which should have been included.Bad product AND bad seller

CommentsTitle: Vintage sound, but clear enough to enjoy.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 17, 2020
CommentsContent: Yes I love the vintage sound of the static needle as you start the record, but they play very good.  It's fun listening to old 45's and 33's. My family and I had a great time playing music on the record player.  Its really loud enough to enjoy.

CommentsTitle: Great, try connecting to speaker if you have one
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 4, 2018
CommentsContent: Great vinyl, classic and sharp looking, plays well. 2 issues: I (without researching so it's my own fault) assumed it could maybe connect through Bluetooth to other speakers, but the Bluetooth is to connect other devices to play through the record player. What's the point of having a record player if you're gonna plug your phone in and listen to downloaded music? Because the sound itself isn't all that great. So I connected a speaker to the player for better quality sound.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 12, 2020
CommentsContent: Purchased for my nephew’s birthday.  Arrived in actual record player box (without any extra box/padding), so I was concerned about its playability.  No worries!  Record player works well.  Perfect for beginners.  Great gift.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2020
CommentsContent: My grand daugher just loved it!!! got to play 33 1/3rd records on it...Sound is just like the old players back in the day!don't know about the bluetooth!! My grand  daughter used it yet!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 17, 2019
CommentsContent: I bought this to play my LPs. Sound quality is not very good. But not bad for the price, I guess. I'm hoping I can attach some external speakers to it. Great looking and easy to use.

CommentsTitle: For the price, i cant complain too much
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 12, 2020
CommentsContent: its okay for the price. Since its cheap, the records skip. I fixed this by putting a 5 cent or 25 cent (depends on the record i want to play) with tape at the tip of the needle arm. For the price, i cant complain.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 6, 2019
CommentsContent: Based on the reviews for this item, I expected a bit more. The sound quality of this record player is equivalent to the sound quality of my 3 year old son's Disney record player. Also, my record player came with tears on both corners of the top part of the record player. I don't recommend this record player to anyone with a refined ear for sound.

CommentsTitle: Can't even play a brand new record
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 2, 2019
CommentsContent: I ordered it during black friday and even at that price it wasn't worth it for me. It skipped old records and a brand new out of a packaging too. It seemed to work better for the 2nd or 3rd songs, but the 1st song was horrible. It's very flimsy and I guess you get what you pay for. Returning ASAP and getting something else.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 3, 2021
CommentsContent: This was for my teenaged g'daughter for Christmas. She liked it..she really liked it. Still does. Makes me want one and start buying vinyl. Easy to use, great sound quality!

CommentsTitle: Just What I Was Looking For!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 18, 2021
CommentsContent: I love this Record Player! I love that its vibrant red! It's so easy to use for a beginner like me.For me it's perfect. Sounds great, works perfectly, and is easy to store away when it's not being used.I personally leave it out but to each their own. You won't regret this purchase!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 17, 2020
CommentsContent: I was excited to receive this record player. The excitement died quickly as the sound quality was not that great but ok. Bluetooth worked great, but the record player did not function. Decided to return it and invest in something of higher quality

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2021
CommentsContent: Got this as a birthday gift for my dad he loves it. He had a ton of records with no player, now he and  my mom dance the night away to their old favorites.

CommentsTitle: Great price for a nice record player
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2021
CommentsContent: I absolutely love this record player. I went to an old book store and bought some vinyls and have been obsessed with how they sound on this record player. Really recommend!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   The comment I received from the special person I gifted this item to: “This thing is so cool!! I feel like it’s an antique and I’m so cool to have one 😂”The sound quality and Bluetooth is rated based on volume capacity in a large space/room.

CommentsTitle: Did not work when I got it!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 30, 2019
CommentsContent: Did not work when I got it!

CommentsTitle: My order was not paid attention to
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 26, 2019
CommentsContent: The product per say was fine.  It was the fact that I ordered my Granddaughter the Flag one and received a plain black one.  I gave it to her as a Birthday present so instead of taking it out of the box first I let her unwrap.  The disappointment as she was expecting a flag one was very sad to me but she said she would just keep it as she wanted to listen to her album.  She is a a very patriotic person and this was upsetting to me!!

CommentsTitle: Solid connection, Clear & Crisp, Great Design 👍
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2021
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   It's a great record player, clear & crisp 👌 with the right sound system. The speakers aren't bad if you owned a studio or used it in a small area. However you want this to be in you living room, I suggest buying a sound system using an aux cord. The Bluetooth connection was confusing. Overall great product that sounds great with a solid sound system.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 9, 2021
CommentsContent: It has been so fun to finally play records from the '60s that I have had in storage for so long.  Playing some of the children's records, comedy albums, and classical recordings that our family enjoyed so often in those years has brought back many great memories of simpler times when we would gather together around a record player. This Victrola copy even looks like the vintage one we had and the sound is authentic.  Such a great buy!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 23, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this as a birthday gift for my boyfriend, he was so happy! We've gotten records from his grandparents and there's nothing like the sound of a record player. The speakers are amazing, Bluetooth hooks up quick. I have no complaints! Great buy!

CommentsTitle: Super cute for a starter record player!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 9, 2019
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   I got the item just now and the sound is clear and very easy to function. Read and follow the instructions so you don’t break or bend anything. I bought it because of the price and the color. Matches my living room. I hope it lasts...

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 10, 2021
CommentsContent: Poor quality. It arrived with the screws stripped out of one of the lid hinges. Hinge was detached. Only used small screws in cheap press board. Really don't think it would've held up. Sent it back.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 1, 2021
CommentsContent: Ah the good old days. Plenty of record players available but this was all I wanted or needed. Might add speakers some time. Hubs has Rush albums and it needs to be loud.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2021
CommentsContent: Product is great, has really nice sound quality and I like that it's portable & includes an extra needle. The bluetooth is easy to connect as well. I only gave it 4 stars because I ordered it in the color gray, and was sent red (but didn't care enough to exchange it)

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 9, 2018
CommentsContent: Great value for the money. Let’s you play all those old records in a compact package. Bluetooth works pretty well. Only drawback is the sound is a bit tinny.. even when connected to larger speakers with a subwoofer..  could use a different needle for 78 rpm records, and a place to store the power supply in the case. very satisfied. Recommend to anyone looking for a good portable player

CommentsTitle: Small piece inhibited spinning at first... but now it works GREAT
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 22, 2020
CommentsContent: We were a little bit nervous after reading some of the reviews, but it seemed to be the best option for the price we wanted. While we were first setting it up we had trouble with the table; it was wobbly and would only turn a few times. BUT we found a small round piece under (top right of the part that spins) which was inhibiting it from turning all the way. After removing that part and placing it in the indent where it belongs, it worked great!! Haven't tried the bluetooth aspect yet. But with the record we've used so far it sounds great and was all we hoped for!! Hoping that continues.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 5, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased this for the BT features, which really isn't a feature at all.  Read the specs carefully as I got scammed.  I would be really upset but the record player plays on the phono settings - with average or adequate sound.If I'm wrong, please tell me how to connect my wireless speakers without the need for a RCA cord - which, by the way, doesn't work for me either.  I have a UE Boom, that I can't use.  Very unfortunate.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 23, 2020
CommentsContent: Something sounds off with the sound quality, it's sluggish and slow sounding even on the right setting.  Also, the speakers don't work correctly and sound only comes out one side.  Sent it back.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 27, 2019
CommentsContent: Not the best out there, but definitely the best for people just getting into vinyl records. Sound quality is great until you get to a medium-loud quality. It depends a lot on how clean the vinyl you have is and the quality of it. It works without issues, is fairly straightforward, and has line in + Bluetooth in + aux/headphone out + RCA out features. Really great device for $40.  If you plan to get into serious or light vinyl collecting, I recommend you start out with one like this, then gift it to someone else and get a fancier one if and when your collection has grown. Anybody who buys this will be satisfied considering the player costs about as much two new vinyls.

CommentsTitle: Great choice for beginner on a budget
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 20, 2017
CommentsContent: Great choice for a beginner on a budget. My 13 year old bought this herself and teaching herself. Yes the speakers are weak, but who cares! If you want better, pay more for a higher quality one. This serves or purpose excellently. She can take to get friends house, grandparents house, tech others the basics and super easily! Those bad reviews think they should get a Mercedes by investing $100. Have the correct expectations going in, this is budget friendly record player. Excellent for beginners and novices. Great choice!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 9, 2021
CommentsContent: Pretty happy with this. Went out thrift ing and brousing thru old LP's sound quality is pretty good but I think at some point I will add some little small external speakers.

CommentsTitle: My first record player - the wait was worth it!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 17, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   This is the first record player I’ve owned and I couldn’t be happier. I love the sound quality and the easy setup. This is one of the best purchases I’ve ever made.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 20, 2018
CommentsContent: That is how long it lasted. Then the turntable would turn  1/4 of an inch then nothing. So with the extended warranty I sent it back and ordered a different brand name. Understand I know it was portable, it never moved from the spot I put it to play records. I just like the size of the unit.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 20, 2020
CommentsContent: Good points, cute, easy to set up, simple, and good pricing. Sound quality not so great - good for kids or non-audiophiles. We did not get this w high fidelity in mind. But it's missing the additional stylus, and the stylus is not a good one so we need the extra stylus. Thinking about returning it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2021
CommentsContent: I knew I was not going to get true stereo sound but there was zero range. I have gotten better sound quality from inexpensive Bluetooth speakers. The search continues.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 1, 2018
CommentsContent: If you are even considering buying a record player I'd like to take a moment here to thank you for helping to keep vinyl and physical music alive. This player works perfectly. I LOVE the color. Great quality. This is the cheapest, great quality one I found. At first I ordered one from Best Buy around Christmas time and they really disappointed me with telling me they were out of stock AFTER I had waited forever. So then I came on Amazon and found this one. I think Crosley is the most popular brand people are buying now, but this is exactly the same and cheaper. PLUS my grandmother said "Victrola" was the name on her record player back when they came out, apparently.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 19, 2020
CommentsContent: Tested it with a couple of 45s. I love it. I haven't tested it with a Bluetooth speaker yet but I am Happy.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 26, 2020
CommentsContent: Skips horribly. DO NOT BUY. Victorola should be ashamed to sell this product.

CommentsTitle: Pure crap. One star because that was the least allowable.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 26, 2020
CommentsContent: Got this for my teenage son for Christmas. Could not hear. Speaker did not work. The only way we could hear it was to put our ear next to the needle. My son asked if it was pre-owned....upon removing it from the packaging he noticed a big dent in one of the corners. As excited as we were to have him open it and use it, we were ten times as disappointed to have him receive a gift that didn't work. Quality was awful. Not sure if I should return it or just cut my losses.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 17, 2020
CommentsContent: Very easy to set up for a first time record player owner. Love the suit case style. Did not expect much from the build in speakers but was impressed with the sound. The bluetooth connectivity is also a great addition when I want to listen to songs on my phone.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 19, 2019
CommentsContent: I haven’t opened this as I bought this as a gift so I’m not sure what the quality is yet. The box it comes in says exactly what it is; if you live with the person you’re getting it for you’d better hope you get to it before them.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 22, 2021
CommentsContent: Decent product,  but my child couldn't figure out their terrible website to register it, so lost out on the free gift.  Email to support went unanswered.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 15, 2019
CommentsContent: Cant rate usability,  as it arrived broken. Ended up getting a non portable for slightly more that has a full sized turntable. This would be great for kids rooms, but that's about it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 10, 2018
CommentsContent: Works great. Easy set up. Bluetooth connectivity is awesome but to actually listen to records on it the sound can be a little disappointing. I was also expecting this to be a "chargeable device" aka you could use it unplugged since it says portable, but I realize nowadays that simply means it's lightweight and compact. Still a good product though... even came with an extra needle. If you intend on using this simply as a turntable you should be very pleased.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 23, 2021
CommentsContent: Don't buy this product me and my father bought this and it came in a used state and not the new state we had paid for there was no power supply and no extra needle the record players exterior was scratched and dented and the inside of the record player had the entire thing sticking up and not down in place it was loose the latch was very loose didn't do barely anything to close it, was missing the needle cover the needle looked bent and didn't work I do not recommend at all.

CommentsTitle: I absolutely LOVE this turn table
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 28, 2018
CommentsContent: I absolutely LOVE this turn table! I got the tie dye version, and the vibrancy of the colors is great! The sound quality is what I assumed it would be. It is rather loud if turned all the way up, however I do feel as if the speakers would blow pretty easy. I have never used the Bluetooth feature, I just use it to play vinyl. I leave it out on my desk in the living room, and have had many compliments on it. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 8, 2020
CommentsContent: It works as a record player should!I am actually impressed. We bought the shiplap one, and obviously they arent using real shiplap. I assumed it would be an ugly vinyl wrap, but the quality is better than i expected!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 4, 2020
CommentsContent: Best purchase that I made in a long time! Great gift for any music lovers . I can finally listen to the records that my mother and grandmother listened to. Definitely plan on growing the collection of vinyls. Sound quality is awesome and it's great there is the option to use Bluetooth to pair to my phone or something else. Easy to use for beginners of vinyl record players! Not to forget it's cute too! I ended up getting the turquoise one to match my room and adds a retro laid back vibe to the room. Definitely recommend this and would purchase again!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 3, 2020
CommentsContent: Record player came packaged very well and looked really cool so I had high hopes, read the quick set up instructions and followed them accordingly and set the player up, but it didn't work at all, the phone light never stayed lit.  After finally getting the light to stay on and the turntable to spin, it played but the speakers were very faint and you could barely hear it, so gave up and packed it up.  Returning it, don't waste your time or money.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2020
CommentsContent: This was supposed to be a Christmas gift for my partner. It arrived damaged, for one.  Secondly, this is a very cheap model, despite the listed price. You're getting a $20 quality player and paying extra for a nice color. 100% would never purchase again. We returned and recieved a full refund, so they did earn one star for a smooth transaction.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 25, 2020
CommentsContent: Gift for my 13 year old son, who likes all things retro electronic.  Perfect mix of modern tech and old school charm.  Plays records wonderfully, and easy to Bluetooth from phone as well!

CommentsTitle: Very portable, needs bigger speakers though.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 19, 2021
CommentsContent: Husband loves playing old records. One of his favorite gifts.  It is easily portable and so he can cart it into his basement workshop and play the Rolling Stones to his heart's content.  Needs bigger speakers - -I think can attach but not sure as he has not let me even check it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 18, 2018
CommentsContent: Product broken in shipping. While the product seems to be made well it does not work due to shipping practices. It seems like a nice product but I would suggest buying it in a store.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2021
CommentsContent: Great gift for my thirteen year old. Sounds great! He plays it all the time in his bedroom upstairs and sound is still great down below. I also love how he can attach headphones to it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 23, 2020
CommentsContent: I am not a pro but I just wanted something to play my records on. Some reviews are not so kind. But this works for me

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 7, 2020
CommentsContent: No Stylus in the arm or extra as stated.  When I contacted customer service they said I don't need a PEN to operate a record player.....NO KIDDING.  Needed it for a specific event and it didn't work.

CommentsTitle: Sounds tinny and skips on everything.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 8, 2020
CommentsContent: Purchased with 3 new albums for my daughter.  It started skipping right away on all of the records.  There is no adjustment on the tone arm or anything so we tried the 'penny trick' which worked only slightly better.  The first one we got had a slightly warped platter.  Sent it back and got a replacement right away.  Same problem with the skipping on all the records, every track.  It was unusable, the speakers sound awful.  Returned second unit for a refund.

CommentsTitle: Skips right out of the box
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 27, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased this for my teenaged daughter for Christmas.  Brand new records on a brand new record player, and each one is skipping.  We tested those records on my husband's record player and there in no skip in the vinyl.  We changed the needle, and the records continue to skip.  I've tried reaching out to the manufacturer, and I'm hoping they'll work with us to make this right.  Of course the box was tossed in the recycling with the rest of the holiday trash.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2021
CommentsContent: The player is good, speakers on the player need some help. And really it's not the same as on old record player. I purchased this because I wanted the old sound of the needle on the album and it just doesn't have it. It is a nice display peice

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 21, 2017
CommentsContent: I bought this not even four months ago and it's already broken after VERY light use. We have it in our children's playroom up on a high storage piece where they can't touch it. We've taken good care of it and yet it now sounds like the music is underwater. We replaced the needle and it still sounds horrible. :(

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 25, 2019
CommentsContent: This is my first record player that I've owned. I needed a small portable one for my room since I don’t have much space. I love it though! It came safely packaged and with easy to ready instructions. I wish the speakers sounded better, hut they aren’t terrible things. I enjoy listening to my records on there and glad I bought this~

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 29, 2018
CommentsContent: Ok, you’re not going to be mixing & scratching at the techno clubs with this, or kickstarting your DJ career...but if you want a solid entry level turntable to enjoy your collection of 300+ albums that have gone unplayed for 17 years, then yes, you’ll love it. Nice Bluetooth speaker so you can play your current playlists too. Again though, you’re not going to be turnin the party out with this thing. But you will get to appreciate all those albums again!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 4, 2019
CommentsContent: I've had this for about 6 months. At first it was decent sound and a really cool thing to have to play my grandma her records of Dean Martin. But I haven't used it in about a month or two and when I plug it in, I smell something BURNING and it wont turn on. It only gives you a month to return, so I missed it :/ I hope they see this and give me a replacement. All that money just to last a couple month. Not worth it 👎

CommentsTitle: Got it as gift, Given as a gift.

Very happy with this purchase.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 29, 2018

CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.

CommentsTitle: do yourself a favor and get one of these
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 21, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 10, 2019

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 21, 2017

It did take me a minute how to connect it via Bluetooth from my phone because I have never used it before. It has great sound, I don't need it blasting because I do have neighbors in close proximity. I absolutely love the color of the case too. Very happy with my purchase.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 3, 2021
CommentsContent: Speaker sounds good for what it is. Plays well. Love the blue

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 10, 2019

Speakers are great too!

The only reason I’m giving 2 stars is because I can use the Bluetooth function

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 25, 2019

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 5, 2018

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 6, 2021

CommentsContent:

CommentsTitle: It's good for the price I guess...

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 15, 2019
CommentsContent: There is a design flaw with this product. The lid gets in the way of the record spinning, and I've found most records, especially newer ones, can't clear it and end up sounding slowed and distorted. I removed the screws and disconnected the top to solve the problem. After reading reviews, many people are complaining about their music sounding distorted, and I wonder if this would fix their issue. I have no idea how this product made it to the shelf; it is not designed to function properly.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 13, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 12, 2018
CommentsContent: My daughter used her birthday money on this after doing her own research. She LOVES it! Sound quality is good enough that sometimes I have to tell her to turn it down a little. It’s definitely a great choice for beginning vinyl lovers.

CommentsContent:

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 24, 2020
CommentsContent: Got this as a gift for my brother. He absolutely loved it. Its portability and size are awesome. The sound volume is appropriate not too loud or too low. Bluetooth works fine. Plays different speeds and sizes. Absolute success.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 3, 2020

Thus is by far the worst record player I have ever used or seen. Very disappointed...

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2019
CommentsContent: It's great as a portable device but the speakers are poor. I wasn't expecting it to be wonderful either. I know it is compact and cheaply made but the speakers are not great. CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 10, 2019
CommentsContent: Bought this for my sister for Christmas and she went crazy for it. She doesn't actually play anything on it (it's more for decoration and being fancy). CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 17, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 10, 2020

CommentsTitle: Not the best but not bad.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 21, 2019
CommentsContent: It's a super cheap turntable so you can't expect too much. The pros are its portable, lightweight, and plays through Bluetooth and aux cord as well as records.  The cons are its cheap plastic feel, the sound is nearly all treble, and parts like the needle seem easily breakable.  For its price though I'd say it's worth it.

CommentsTitle: when i played my records i was over whelmed with emotions listening to sweet sounds of real music
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 6, 2015
CommentsContent: well worth every dime spent. when i played my records i was over whelmed with emotions listening to sweet sounds of real music. to see this box's bring out so much sound i could not believe my ears. i would recommend this to everyone. this is a must buy product if you like the feel of going back in time. LOVE, LOVE, LOOOOOOOOOOVE IT... would love to know how i can purchase extra needles for storage. i love this player so much i never want to be without enough needles. please can you email me this information thank you much. THINK I JUST FOUND THE PERFECT CHRISTMAS GIFTS FOR FAMILY

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2021
CommentsContent: A good simple vinyl player with good sound. Nothing special but all you need to simply play vinyls, should make a good addition to a bigger system one day.

CommentsTitle: You Get What You Pay For
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 2, 2019

It gets the job done, I guess, it does play my vinyls, but it's not a good quality product all around.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 28, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 2, 2021
CommentsContent: Excellent dieting and very well conceived. Unfortunately the sound quality from the internal speakers is dreadful! However I purchased on the basis of it having bluetooth! CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 2, 2020
CommentsContent: This record player WILL NOT WORK/PLAY on newly pressed vinyl!!! It will play old vinyl. New pressed vinyl is pressed super tight (for better sound) and the cuts or grooves are not as deep, so the needle will skip. So if you plan on loading up on newly pressed records, look for a higher quality player$$$$.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 21, 2020

Would make a great gift for anyone into vintage things.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 6, 2020
